name: MultiVersus: Season 4
description: Get your guitars and best goth garb. It's time for the Goth Girl Season! Season 4 of MultiVersus has been summoned! Unlock Raven and Marceline through 2 separate battlepasses, and play on 2 new maps based Samurai Jack and Adventure Time.

name: The Gleaming Grill
description: The Gleaming Grill is a cooking, 4 player Co-Op game where you need to keep the increasing amount of customers happy to prevent your restaurant from going bankrupt. Work with your friends as fast as you can to ensure all your customers leave with a smile on their face!

name: Eve Online: Revelant
description: The Revenant expansion for EVE Online is live! Join forces with the Deathless and strike at the heart of darkness as you explore thrilling new opportunities, fearsome ships, powerful weapons, mercenary dens that harness new resources, and new ways to activate and unify your corporation.

name: Hood RPG
description: Dark Humor & Satire: Experience a story that blends comedic mischief with clever parody, ensuring laughs and surprises at every turn. Engage in unconventional turn-based battles. Be ready to fall over laughing!

name: 0101: Classic Bonus Levels 3
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Classic levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Midnight Snack
description: Midnight Snack is a short single-player horror game about making a sandwich

name: Liminal Universe
description: An exploration game that delves into the depths of loneliness. Wander through empty rooms, search for signs of an abandoned world, and listen to the sounds around you. No dangerous chases, just silence and an empty world to explore.

name: Smells Like A Mushroom: 100% Vegan Edition
description:
Includes super-cool neon effect cover, awesome sticker sheet, stunning boss guide

Features
CHILL OUT AND LAUGH WITH THE MAGIC MUSHROOMS
The fun is provided by hilarious dialogues and a plot filled with symbols of "human" pop culture.

STOP THE MUSHACRE!
Take on the role of the carrot commando to liberate every planet in the solar system.

Use a variety of weapons to defeat different enemies and customise your appearance - will the vegetables succeed?

PLAY ALONE OR BRING A FRIEND
Enjoy the single-player mode with a bizarre storyline or join forces with a friend in split-screen co-op for two players.

EXPLORE SPACE WORLDS
Vast interstellar maps with a beautiful galactic art style accompanied by retro electro music.

name: VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival
description:
In "VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival," you find yourself as a nomadic explorer cast into the mysterious Void, a world with its own secrets and surprises. This enigmatic realm invites you to uncover its hidden mysteries and navigate its unique landscapes, each filled with challenges and unexpected encounters.
Construct and enhance your sailing vessel to better equip yourself for the journey ahead. Starting with a simple raft, you'll develop it into a formidable vessel complete with a ship's hold, mast, and captain's cabin. Customize your vessel with various objects, from storages and workbenches to decorations, making it truly your own.
As you traverse the surreal terrains of the Void, you'll confront numerous foes and navigate through ever-changing environments. Whether you journey solo or uncover unexpected twists along the way, the Void promises an unparalleled adventure waiting to be experienced, testing your survival skills and resilience.

name: Myrmica
description: Myrmica is an investigation and puzzle adventure viewed from an isometric perspective. Explore a petrol station while chased by a time anomaly. Manipulate the routines of 5 unique characters to achieve your goal, create your situations trapped in a time loop, and uncover the truth of Complex B13B.

name: Viscera
description: Viscera is an arcade-inspired, gleefully excessive top-down shooter. Fight through the muck and gore against the mutant menace. Master over 50 weapons and more than 80 abilities. Prove you’re the best at withstanding the horde until the end takes you. Viscera awaits. Soak in it.

name: Hidden Storehouse Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Sweep Maidens
description: A Minesweeper game in which anime girls assist you. (◕ω◕✿)

name: HighKing
description: Use your mouse to climb the mountain. The road is very steep and long. But don't worry. You can use your arms and legs for this climb.

name: Retail Mage
description: Welcome, Retail Mage, to your first day of employment at MageMart! Get 5 star reviews from customers before the store closes. Say and do (almost) anything in this open-ended, creative co-op game!

name: Trainee Death Simulator
description: You will play as a Trainee Death, harvesting Souls to pay off your debt. Random choice events offer you various options: Lie in bed and slack off since the debt is endless anyway, Or follow your senior to earn some extra Souls, collecting outfits to switch up your style.

name: Save Scream and Run
description: Endless Runner game.A microphone is required for the game.The game is an endless runner in which the player controls a chicken that runs from a fox. The player must jump over obstacles and collect bonuses.

name: Sea of Stars: Dawn of Equinox
description: Free update adding local cooperative play, combat 2.0, revamped prologue, bonus cinematic scene, speedrunner mode, difficulty presets, improved parrot relic, Quebecois localization and quality of life improvements.

name: Out of Your Mind
description: A hand-drawn, comic-style visual novel where your choices shape the storyline. Guide Lia through various decisions and emotions that lead to different outcomes.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Crossroads
description: Patch 7.1 introduces: new main scenario quests; the first installment from the alliance raid Echoes of Vana'diel, Jeuno: The First Walk; the Extreme version of the Sphene's Burden trial; a new dungeon, Yuweyawata Field Station; a new Ultimate Raid, Futures Rewritten; a new type of high-end content, Chaotic Alliance Raids; and more sidequests and sidecontent.

name: Federation Mycha
description: Step into a world over run with Mycha, a strange mineral with seemingly magical powers. Clear monster-infested environments and protect researchers on your own or with up to three other players online. Welcome to The Federation.

name: Tetris Forever
description:
Tetris Forever celebrates the original, genre-inspiring puzzle game that escaped from behind the Iron Curtain, onto the world stage, and into our cultural consciousness.

More than 15 playable classic games from the series' history are featured, including many being released for the first time outside Japan. Battle your friends in the multiplayer cult favorite Tetris Battle Gaiden, create massive explosions to clear lines in Super Bombliss, and see where it all began in 1984 with an accurate recreation of the first version of Tetris on the Electronika 60 computer.

name: Honey Grove
description: Honey Grove is the cozy gardening and farming game you’ve always wanted to play! Plant and nurture an ever-changing garden of flowers, vegetables, and fruits, with each bloom and harvest bringing you closer to rebuilding the town. Design your dream garden with real flower species and adorable decorations you collect along the way!

name: Neo Harbor Rescue Squad
description: Live the life of a rookie paramedic through frantic minigame action and a wild, funny story. Juggle waves of patients with a battle-like triage system; master dozens of treatment minigames; and win the city's recognition from the rival fire department!

name: Snowfall Symphony: A Tale of Crustallus
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating visual novel set in a dark vampire world where romance and cruel decisions shape your fate, leading to multiple unique endings.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Hierophant Class
description: This DLC adds the new playable class to Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: an Inquisitor with a Hierophant background.

name: River City Girls 2: Double Dragon DLC
description: River City Girls 2: Double Dragon DLC is an upcoming DLC for River City Girls 2 which adds in Billy and Jimmy from Double Dragon as playable characters.

name: Minha Casa
description: Awakened in the middle of the night by her own anxiety, Robertha will have to face her own demons beyond her own home.

name: Farming Simulator 25
description: Farming Simulator 25 floods the fields with a host of new machines, gameplay features, visual upgrades, and even fresh water to grow rice - adding even more agricultural depth and diversity to the family-friendly series.

name: Roll Five
description: Roll Five is the dice game roguelike. Play this exciting deckbuilder where you compose creative dice figures, discover your favorite prisms, all in a pixel art medieval fantasy ambiance.

name: Grid Ranger
description: A shortform heart-pounding shmuplike. Level up your mouse dexterity and see what lies beyond the grid...

name: Necromancer's Revenge
description: Become a necromancer betrayed by the Demon King. In this game combining survival, roguelite, and tower defense elements, defeat monsters, collect souls, and place totems. Summon the Demon King for revenge!

name: Security: The Horrible Nights
description: Every time you die, a new story begins. You are the nighttime security guard at a hospital. Your job is to monitor the hospital and fix problems when they happen. Every night, a new horror tale will unfold. If you can survive enough nights, you will learn the truth behind all the horror.

name: Emergency Cleanup Co.
description: A simulation game about an employee at a cleaning company.

name: Time Treker
description: Time Treker is a 2D top-view shooter game. Players engage in constant combat to achieve achievements, activate abilities, and unlock heroes, weapons, and plug-ins. Customize with different combinations of weapons and plug-ins, and play your own combat genre.

name: The Rise of the Golden Idol
description: The Award-winning detective saga returns. Uncover the truth behind 20 strange cases of crime, death and depravity in the 1970s. The world has changed dramatically - the sins of humanity have not.

name: Loinkham TD
description: A tower defense game set in the village of Loinkham. Use towers and various interactable objects in the environment to protect your little oinkers and their assests! Each map offers something new to help you with your journey. Unlock new towers and maps as you play.

name: Beastieball
description: Coach a sports team of Beasties in this turn-based volleyball RPG! Your Beasties' relationships power up their teamwork!

name: Capt Crabs a Slimy Adventure
description: Capt Crabs, the pirate crab, was out with his crew searching for treasure on a mysterious island when suddenly his ship was taken by some mischievous slimes! Now he's on a mission to retrieve his ship and treasure and get back to the pirate life he loves!

name: Xenotilt: Hostile Pinball Action
description: Lightning strikes again!! Xenotilt, the sequel to the cult hit, Demo's Tilt. Get ready for another pinball fantasy. Xenotilt shreds the envelope with face-melting gameplay & graphics.

name: Ricochet Rodeo
description: Saddle up for Ricochet Rodeo, a 2D-platform, pvp brawl to see who's the fastest shooter in the pixel-rendered west. Assemble a posse of up to 8 cowboys to dance in chaotic deathmatches where bullets bounce and 1 hit kills.

name: Synchronicity
description: 1v1 turn-based tactics, online or vs a practice-AI in a futuristic cyberpunk setting. Plan 3 steps in advance while your opponent does the same. Mind-game and outsmart your opponent with a variety of abilities, destructible and penetrable environments and a good strategy.

name: Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age
description: From the lead designer of Cold Waters, Sea Power lets you control NATO and Warsaw Pact forces in modern naval conflict campaigns. Use your advanced naval weaponry and sensors to respect rules of engagement and defeat the enemy forces in a tense fight for initiative and air/naval supremacy.

name: In Sink
description: Work together to solve the various puzzles and escape rooms and break free in this stylized multiplayer co-op adventure. Victory requires more than just you and your partner thinking alike - you'll have to be In Sink.

name: Operator8
description: An unparalleled alien invasion has overwhelmed the Mining Block Facility on the moon Triton, leaving only death and horror in its wake. You are a mercenary known as Operator8 and you alone have been called in to bring a stop to this fierce attack.

name: Pipe Connect
description: Sin descripción

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Ultimate Hunting Bundle
description: With the Ultimate Hunting Bundle, you're ready for anything.

name: Battle Of Witches
description: Bouncing bullet game, the player clicks somewhere on the screen for the fairy to throw a spell in that direction. The spell bounces off the walls of the scene, and the player will need to use this to their advantage to hit the rival.

name: Crab Crawl
Big Trouble in Little Chimney
description: Krampus is Coming! Grab your Shotgun, finish your hot punch and don't forget your mission: Save the Christmas! Big Trouble in Little Chimney is highly-addictive and fast paced arena bullet-hell shooter.

name: Aerofly FS Flight Simulator
description: Welcome aboard, Captain. Fly around the world to thousands of airports in detailed aircraft with 3D cockpits. Prove your skills in many challenging missions.

name: Chakana
description:
You planned for a quiet evening. The table is set, the atmosphere is warm, and the night seems to be unfolding just as you'd hoped. But as the meal progresses, something feels off.

In this atmospheric horror game, explore your home as strange events disrupt your date, leaving you to navigate through questions, confrontations, and your own dread. Each decision can bring you closer to unraveling the mystery or plunge you deeper into its grip.

The time is running out, manage the eerie silence, and tread carefully to keep your secrets hidden—or risk exposing yourself. Face a twisting psychological horror that questions how far you'd go to protect yourself from your fate.

name: GGmuks Casino: Slots
description: Step into the fun and thrill of GGmuks Casino: Slots, where every spin is a chance to win big! Start with a small balance and place bets to chase exciting payouts with vibrant icons and a playful casino atmosphere. Enjoy classic slot machine excitement with a lighthearted, casual twist!

name: Put the Sausage in the Bun
description:
Guide a wobbly sausage into its bun using balloons and bees in this chaotic physics puzzle. Can you master the fine art of getting the sausage in just the right place?

Put the Sausage in the Bun is a physics-based puzzle game where your goal is straightforward— get the sausage into the bun. Use balloons and bees to move the sausage through various obstacles, with realistic sausage'y physics making everything a greater challenge than it needs to be. As you progress, new levels introduce new challenges, requiring more precision, fast and creative thinking to complete.

name: Semper Fidelis
description: Semper Fidelis is a collection of 3 maps for Doom II that use plenty of Boom trickery to make this poor marine's hostile experience even more interesting.

name: Project Borealis: Prologue
description: Project Borealis: Prologue is a fan-made game which expands on the classic episodic series by Valve Software. Return to a snow covered Ravenholm and experience the iconic town reimagined in an arctic atmosphere and modern graphics.

name: The Zium Exposition
description:
The Zium Exposition is a Museum Exploration Game filled with artwork and installations from artists around the world, working in various mediums and styles.

High in the Zwitz Alps, visit the foundational Zwitzerland Okkozium; the historic central pavilion of The Grand Expo. Ride the Okkozium Exposition Ropeway through the vaulting tunnels of Mount Okkozium, arriving at The Archival Plateau, high above Zwitzerland. There, you will ride the Expo Elevator down towards The Okkozium where 45 artists have assembled to tell the story of The Zium Exposition.

name: Heart-Lung Machine
description:
HEART-LUNG MACHINE is a VR horror game designed to create an immersive and intense experience. Players find themselves in an abandoned underground complex, where they must navigate dark corridors with a dying flashlight, seeking items to survive. As they venture deeper, they uncover disturbing secrets about the facility’s past, all while avoiding a lurking presence.

The game’s AI operates autonomously, offering a dynamic challenge that requires stealth to evade detection. Realistic hiding mechanics let players physically crouch behind objects, crawl into shafts, slide under tables, or hide in lockers.

Features:
- Autonomous, AI-driven monster
- Realistic hiding mechanics
- Randomized elements
- Hardcore survival horror
- Dark, unsettling themes

name: Elements and Build
description: Form your own genre with skills in different elements, use building rewards to build your own unique maze in randomly generated levels, and fight to survive waves of monsters to win

name: Bird Simulator 24
description: Take flight in Bird Simulator 24, an outrageous action game where you reclaim your rightful territory from the humans and assert your genetic dominance! As a fearless bird, your mission is simple: rule the skies, reclaim your homeland, and fight the humans in the most hilarious ways imaginable.

name: Mad Void
description: Mad Void is a chaotic space survival online co-op, you face alone or up to 3 crewmates alarming dangers on each mission. Sent out by the Galactic Confederation to extract lost tech from fallen spaceship that succumbed in epic space battle, find your way in the mad void of space to retrieve the tech before the Enemy returns.

name: Aria of Song
description: This is a single player role-playing adventure game, where you need to play as a human and go to a different world to defeat four disaster monster bosses, obtain their disaster core, and ultimately win the game!

name: Newspaper Day
description: Take on the role of a newspaper delivery person in a seemingly quiet neighborhood. Every morning, you carry out your job, delivering the day's news to your neighbors' doors. However, you soon realize that things are not what they seem.

name: Legends of Boom
description: Legends of Boom is a fast-paced Card Battle game. Collect and upgrade cards, challenge human and AI opponents online, all while experiencing over 4 hours of commentary by our vice-laden puppet sportscaster, Flip Rimrod.

name: 7 Ate 9
description: Why was 6 afraid of 7? And why did 7 resort to cannibalism? Its your job as detective number 9 to find out what happened in this case of murder by numbers. 7 Ate 9 is a small horror adventure with a lot of secrets to uncover and multiple endings to find.

name: The Adventurers
description: The Adventurers is a turn-based tactical RPG where every decision shapes your legacy. Lead your party of heroes in an open world filled with random events that affect your story. Survive a high fantasy landscape where your epic saga is waiting to be written.

name: Take Me, Vitaly
description: In every woman's life, there comes a moment when she walks into the wrong door... The last thing I remember is a masquerade party at a nightclub and a tall, muscular man with a Belarusian accent who offered to buy me a cocktail...

name: Single Espresso
description: Single Espresso is a single-player, cafe shop management game. Accompany Jade's journey, and help her to overcome obstacles in her new adventure of the mini coffee shop business.

name: Dino Market
description: Animal friends to keep you company while you work on other tasks. Run a cozy market, play with your chat during streams or use productivity tools to help you focus. All from your desktop!

name: Rogue Rollout
description: Rogue Rollout is a roguelike deckbuilder where you score points in a Yahtzee-style dice game, choose powerful artifacts, and face challenging impairments as you push through endless levels.

name: Good Kill!
description: Good Kill is an immersive FPS game where players take control of a door gunner in a military helicopter during the Vietnam War. Engage in intense combat across destructible environments, complete missions, and upgrade your helicopter and weapons to dominate the battlefield.

name: Breadborn
description: Breadborn is a crazy action game where you command an army of crumb minions that came from very own body. Branches, axes, or a killer mini-gun? It's up to you to decide how to equip your army in order to sow chaos among the peasants and get to the PRINCE himself!

name: Lower? Higher!
description: your pawnshop will usher in guests with different needs every day, bargain with them, let the income soar! With the expansion of pawnshops, activities such as sending shop assistants and responding to emergencies are also essential. you seem ordinary transaction may cause the butterfly effect.

name: Crack it Up!
description: Crack it Up! is a trading card collecting game. Order booster packs from your 90s computer, crack them up, sell your duplicates and rarest cards for profit and complete your collections!

name: Slingshottr
description: A co-op physics-based space scrap salvaging game! Work with friends to bring in scrap and receive spaceship upgrades.

name: Operation Marakudja
description: Welcome to Operation Marakudja: The heroes of the mangrove swamp arrive in multiplayer to steal Marakudja's precious fruits! Play as Anaka, Risko, Anzel, Mr.Vy and Hevo, ready to do whatever it takes to harvest the fruits !

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Tourney at the Bear Rock
description: Dive into the thrilling world of knight tournaments! Help Hynek compete in jousting, man-to-man combat and archery, as well as to carry out a mysterious quest that will change his life forever.

name: Universe Has No Favorites
description: Text-based point & click SCI-FI adventure game. As an escaped prisoner with an erased memory and unknown implants in his head, you navigate a dangerous world of the technological underworld on the edge of the civilized universe, uncovering a terrifying mystery that could destroy all of humanity.

name: Tilt Frog
description: Get that Frog to the Top! Use your elastic tongue to swing all the way up a crazy world! Can you reach the peak without falling?

name: Ninja Resurrection: A tale of Kuro
description: Explore "Ninja Resurrection," an intense martial arts game that takes a fresh approach to the genre. This hardcore adventure features a mysterious storyline, demanding combat, diverse moves, and thrilling QTEs. Conquer the challenge, evolve with the game, and become a true ninja master.

name: Menace from the Deep
description: Menace from the Deep is an enthralling Roguelike Deckbuilding card game that unfolds in a dark world, drawing inspiration from Howard Lovecraft and the Cthulhu Mythos.Set against the backdrop of 1920s USA, the narrative revolves around a clandestine occult society.

name: Supurr Cat Cafe: Sandwich Rush
description: Stack towering sandwiches with the help of cute cat friends while building up your dream cat cafe. With plenty of hungry quirky customers around, you’ll need to upgrade your cafe, find new cats to help you and up your sandwich game to keep them happy!

name: Parking World: Build & Manage
description: The hunt for the ultimate parking space will never be more fun than with Parking World. Create your parking garage and carefully manage its operations and staff, overcome dynamic events, use the latest technology, and get ready to discover what perfect parking really looks like. From festival lined grass and mud lots to VIP valet parking and the hustle and bustle of a multistoried airport parking garage, the quest for the ideal space is detailed and varied.

name: Morningstar: Book of the Fallen
description: Morningstar: Book of the Fallen is an Urban Fantasy Adult Visual Novel/RPG. Discover your Destiny, and a cast full of gorgeous and funny girls.

name: Drunken FC
description: Ever wanted to get drunk, play football (soccer), and not worry about the medical bill later? Do you hate animation and love physics? Then here's some physics-based sports action for you and your friends. Play locally or remotely. Move your feet, but don't break the sticks on your controller.

name: Everholm
description: Lilly was spirited away to a mysterious island. As her memories fade, everyone seems to know about her quest for her missing sister. It's time to establish a homestead, meet the islanders, learn their secrets and solve the mystery of Everholm in this open-ended minimalist RPG!

name: Game Dev Fantasy
description: Join the adventure of game development while sailing the seas with your indie studio! Use your wits and strategy to complete development tasks, learn new skills, and launch your game before the deadline. With the sea breeze on your face, you're all set to create an amazing game!

name: Night Stones
description: You awake in Mythica, a cozy island where magical stones change day to night. Explore winding paths or venture into the wilds with your trusty glider and sailboat. To return home, you must befriend quirky townsfolk, discover hidden treasures, master magic, and face enemies in clever puzzle combat.

name: HeistGeist
description: A story-driven RPG set in a cyberpunk version of Central Europe. Play as Alexandra, doublecrossed street-smart thief on the run after a job gone bad. Put together a team of specialists, execute highly elaborate heists, fight in card-based battles and hack into the most secure corporate systems.

name: Codename: Terranova
description:
One copy to play!
The purchase of a single copy of the game grants a friend free access to the Terranova Operating Central System () that involves him as an integral part of this new experience.
(By purchasing the game on Steam you will have access to the Agent role. The Operator role is freely and easily accessible from any smart device and requires an Agent to connect to)

Agent, do you read me?
Codename: Terranova is a two-players 3D co-op communication game.
Your team must beat the training on the Terranova experimental hovering train: this will prepare you to be the most reliable couple, the Field Agent (a.k.a Agent), and the Operations Center (a.k.a. Operator).

Co-op communication
Each mission will test the team's balance: will you be able to communicate efficiently?
As the Agent, you can operate on the train in person to handle devices and solve puzzles.
As the Operator, through the Terranova Operating Central System that can be used by smartphone or PC, you can interact with the Agent and the devices on the train.

name: 201: The Bad Number
description: "201 - The Bad Number" is an interactive science fiction game-book set on a post-apocalyptic Mars. In a world where only 200 people remain, each new inhabitant may hasten civilization's end. Players make choices that impact the fate of humanity and the colony in a unique dystopian setting.

name: Difficult times
description: Monsters are attacking!

name: Undisputed: Deluxe WBC Edition
description: Become Undisputed and rule the ring in the most authentic boxing game to date! Featuring true to life visuals, bone-jarring action, and more licensed boxers than ever before, Undisputed gives you unprecedented control to master every inch of the ring.

name: Cod Quest!
description: Run, grow and defend the UK's last Fish and Chip Shop. Your chippy is under threat from an impending invasion; you have 30 days to prepare. Upgrade your shop, unlock better recipes, purchase new equipment and more!

name: Globs
description: Globs is a puzzle game about the size-changing Globs. Use the properties of their bodies at your advantage to solve a variety of levels, by using them to push each other or against walls, squeeze into tight gaps, grow to block holes.

name: L'entraînement des Guerriers
description:
In this immersive strategy game, you take command of an army in the prehistoric era, facing endless waves of increasingly powerful and determined enemies. Starting with modest resources, your mission is to lead your forces through the ages of prehistory, upgrading your base, developing your troops, and mastering skills and technologies tailored to this primitive world. With each level, the challenges grow tougher, as enemies become more resilient and strategic, making every battle more intense and harder to survive. You’ll need to adapt your strategy, strengthen your defenses, and recruit increasingly powerful units to stay ahead.

Continuous improvement of your camp lies at the heart of the experience. After each battle, you earn science points, a valuable resource that allows you to unlock powerful upgrades. Using these points, you can reinforce your base fortifications, increase your warriors' strength, and unlock new abilities that will turn the tide in upcoming battles. Whether you choose to build an impenetrable defense, train a formidable army, or explore advanced prehistoric technologies, every decision will impact your future combats.

For a more personal touch, you can also customize your units and army with unique skins. These customization options add originality to your playstyle and allow you to forge an army that reflects your vision.

The ultimate challenge is to progress through the levels and overcome the ever-more fearsome waves of prehistoric enemies. As you advance, you’ll unlock new units, from basic warriors to mighty champions, each with unique skills to turn the tide of battle. The enemy waves will grow stronger without relent, but with each level, you’ll gain the tools and knowledge needed to overcome them and lead your army to victory.

And the best part? The game is completely free. Everything is accessible without ever needing to pull out your credit card, thanks to a fair ad-supported system that fuels your progression.

name: A Punk with Wheels 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Unterholz
description: Explore the murky corners and abandoned ruins of an isolated enclave in 15th century Europe. Prevail in chivalrous battle and unveil the mysteries of a dark world. Embark on a non-linear psychological journey through the underbrush of this sinister setting as well as your own soul.

name: The Crown Saga: Pi’s Adventure
description:
In an era when the Demon King reigned over all, lived a wolf girl named Pi.

But all of a sudden... She was chosen by the Crown?!

It shall now be Pi's destiny to become a legendary knight and save Natureland.

Will Pi be able to complete her quests and turn into a legendary knight so she can bring back peace...?

name: Emberwake
description: A dark fantasy survival strategy game where you manage villagers, gather resources, and defend a burning campfire against waves of undead in a relentless battle for survival.

name: Defense Golem
description: Defense Golem is a tower defense game that supports random evolution.

name: Turbo Live
description: Turbo Live is the ultimate party game for your Twitch community. Save the pedestrians or crush them through the chat. Play in co-op or versus mode. Grow your audience, have fun, and build connections during chaotic and unforgettable sessions!

name: Tentacuddle
description: Tentacles have you surrounded! In this score-attack action rogue-lite, sacrifice is the key to reinforcing your power. Set the difficulty of the game and use your Ooze to battle slithering hordes. Maintain your sanity and slither your way to victory!

name: Cursed Halls
description: "Cursed Halls" is a horror game set in a dark, abandoned school, where you must escape a relentless creature. With randomized object placement and permadeath, can you survive this haunting experience?

name: Rhapsody of the Moon Rabbit
description: Rhapsody of the Moon Rabbit is a second player game in Valkyrie Studio. You will operate Reisen Udongein Inaba and Youmu Konpaku,smash the plot of the scientific eccentric.

name: Mizi No!: Kintsugi
description:
Oh hi! Good to see you here.
In case you liked the puzzles in Mizi NO! and crave more, you have come to the right place.
The "Kintsugi" DLC adds 20 more items focusing on repeating patterns. Of course, Mizi will happily knock them over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

Kintsugi is the Japanese art of repairing broken pottery by mending the areas of breakage with lacquer and powdered gold. If you ever wanted to try this, this DLC is for you :)

name: Delicious Date
description: Can you (socially) survive your first date with a really cute and hungry guy?

name: Axe Champ Shoot Out
description: Can you be the Axe Champ?

name: Cubic Run
description: Switch the sides

name: Draw li
description: Draw, connect, and master the art of physics in 40 thrilling levels!

name: Suika Animal Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Breeze Contest
description: The Breeze Contest is a massive Celeste project featuring the largest lobby in the game’s history, with development spanning three months and map creation taking just over one month. This autumn-themed lobby includes 75 unique beginner maps, a Heartside, 200+ strawberries, custom code, extensive custom sprite work, a beautiful endscreen by Fuwamo, and original music. However, using debug tools may cause issues within the lobby or maps. To fully enjoy the mod, make sure to download the Breeze Contest Audio Pack, which is required for some features to work. Enjoy the journey through these beginner-friendly maps!

name: Infinity Slime Dungeon
description: Infinity Slime Dungeon is an Idle RPG roguelite where you guide Jeffrey the Slime on his quest for freedom! Face off against 15 unique enemies in endless waves, collecting souls from each victory to upgrade Jeffrey’s stats and abilities. After every battle, you’ll make a crucial choice: restart and strengthen Jeffrey further with his earned souls, or forge ahead to the next foe, risking it all for greater rewards. Push Jeffrey to new heights—or depths—in his escape!

name: Halo 2 Digsite: E3 2003 Demo
description:
Revisit the debut prototype of Halo 2 in this restoration of the notorious "Earth City" demonstration, initially unveiled at the Xbox press conference during E3 2003.

For the first time ever, take it to the streets, your way, with support for cooperative action, optional navigation points to rehearse the exact demo path and an included 'Playground' version of the level, allowing free roam of the city.

This release represents an effort to rebuild content originally designed for a different functioning game engine, the first campaign collaboration between Digsite and Halo Studios.

name: Messticulous
description: Aim and throw incongruous objects to create an organized mess by following the directives of a completely wacky "tidy up" system!

name: What Lurks Inside
description: Immerse in a 4-player game of deceit and survival where anyone could turn into a monstrous threat. Survivors must escape a dynamic facility, completing missions for a higher score, while the creature blends in, sabotaging their efforts. Trust is your biggest challenge

name: Pixels With Comics
description: Pixels With Comics is musical bullethell game that based on avoid pixels and get defeated by comics, also enjoy music and absolutely die and don't forget to repeat.

name: Damn Zombies
description: First-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic overrun by flesh-hungry zombies. Roam a city devastated by a mysterious virus

name: Kura5: Bonds of the Undying
description: Kura5 is a non-canonical fan game for the Boktai series and it's successor, Lunar Knights. It's neither a full remake nor a sequel, but a remix of both familiar Boktai staples and new elements that seek to recreate the magic that we all loved from the series. Kura5's weather system knows where you are in the real world, so there's no need for a solar sensor. In-game events may even play out differently depending on if you play in darkness or in light...And that's just the start!

name: Cube 3x1
Slitterhead: Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes:
1. Xbox game: "Slitterhead"
2. Bonus app "Slitterhead Digital Soundtrack & Artbook":
- Artbook with commentary by Keiichiro Toyama: "The Art of Slitterhead"
- Soundtrack composed and written by Akira Yamaoka (10 tracks)
*Image and sound data cannot be exported to a USB memory device or similar devices. Content can only be accessed within the app.

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split Retro Collection
description: Happy 10th Anniversary! Retro survival horror lives in these next-gen undead adventures!

name: Madness in the Banaverse
description: Madness in the Banaverse is a single player platform game that combines action and comedy with a cartoonish style, taking as its protagonist the famous YouTuber “El Bananero”, who provides his voice to give life to the character and the most iconic phrases.

name: Tattoo Studio Simulator
description: Become a great tattoo artist and work your way to success! Have you always wanted to learn how to draw tattoos? Now you can do it in our tattoo studio simulator.

name: Kaiju Control Force
description: Lead a team of survivors into the abandoned Kaiju Control Force facilities, where bioengineered rats escaped and research went awry long ago, in this one-screen arcade platformer. Jump, climb and buy items from vending machines to reach the Mecha Kaiju Maintenance Bay and reclaim our city!

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Special Edition
description:
Say cheese! Everyone’s favorite zombie-hunting photojournalist, Frank West, is back in action with the beautifully remastered Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster. Reanimated from the ground up with Capcom’s RE ENGINE, Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster is the definitive remaster of the 2006 classic Dead Rising, which delivered a fresh take on the zombie genre with incredible action, over-the-top combat, hordes of weapon choices, wacky costumes (trust us, they’re even wackier this time around), and a comedic yet compelling storyline

Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster introduces freelance photojournalist Frank West as he ventures to Willamette, Colorado after overhearing there is something going on in town. Frank soon finds out he is in the middle of a zombie takeover and has 72 hours to uncover the truth about this outbreak!

name: Bunny Zoo: Animal Battle Royale
description: Choose your champion, master your skills, and conquer the animal kingdom—are you ready for the ultimate battle?

name: Overheat: Kitchen Chaos
description: Master the chaos or get burned in this kitchen showdown, Only the fastest and smartest chefs survive this madness.

name: Pro Flight Simulator: Deluxe
description: Take Off Into the Ultimate Flying Adventure!

name: Legendary Heroes Unchained
description:
Legendary Heroes Unchained (LHU) is the first game to build a dynamic gaming ecosystem where players and creators fully own, shape, and expand their experiences.

Built on the Base network, LHU’s NFTs are securely backed on IPFS, providing decentralized ownership with extensible metadata that can be used in players’ own projects and games.

In Legendary Heroes Unchained Epoch 1, players embark on a thrilling journey, honing their skills in dungeon exploration, interdimensional battles, and strategic Guild-building:

name: Candivity
description:
Don't let the sweets get outside the dome. Merge them together, and make the biggest candy!
You're about to dive into a sugary adventure! Combine sweets, and prepare yourself for a sugar overload!

Gather extraordinary powers that can save you from any sticky situation. Mix them up, and you might create something even more powerful!

Journey through worlds full of surprises. Each has its own set of challenges. Can you master them all and merge the largest sweet?

name: Tap That Date!
description: Sin descripción

name: Spacesona
description:
The universe is ending, where will you go now?

Journey to the edge of the universe to escape the end, find meaning of life, and find friends! Or, maybe die.

Spacesona is a short visual-novel type adventure game, about making good choices in the moment, and about having good luck!

name: Merge Together
description: Merge Together is a relaxing two-player puzzle game where strategic thinking, harmony, and teamwork are key. Players aim to combine sweet fruits, level by level, to achieve larger fruits and ultimately reach the final goal: the watermelon.

name: Caveheart: Legacy of The Depths
description: Embark on an Epic Quest Beneath the Surface!

name: Survive Undead Rush
description: Outrun, upgrade, and survive the relentless zombie onslaught!

name: Sweet Survivors
description: The purr-fect storm is coming! Can you protect your café from fluffy chaos?

name: D.U.M.B. Ducks
description: D.U.M.B. Ducks is an action-filled, retro platform game. Slaughter giant snails. Battle gigantic beasts. Buy better guns. Blow up walls. Collect fat stacks of cash.

name: Racing Champions
description: Hone your racing skills, sharpen your strategy, and aim for the podium in the ultimate racing challenge!

name: Ghunter
description: GHUNTER is a 3rd person action-adventure, twin-stick shooter game about cooking your prey... ALIVE!!

name: Mars Farce
description: Sin descripción

name: No Strangers
description: An online horror game of exploration, teamwork and betrayal for 3-15 players.

name: Oda a un Bocadillo de Queso
description: Sin descripción

name: ToriDori 2
description: TORIDORI 2 is the wonderful world of a photographer who is able to capture his dreams in the photo, but he can only take 2 shots per dream. The differences of some details will be the difference between these two shots. Carefully explore every corner and enjoy the game.

name: Horrified Hector!
description: Horrified Hector! is a puzzle/exploration game for the Playdate, inspired by spooky kids cartoons and brain-scratching ice maze puzzles.

name: Cerulean Crescent
description:
The Tale of an Untamed Land
Ellerie sets sail for the Cerulean Crescent, a new frontier yet to be conquered by any nation. While she dreams of amassing wealth and power, this untamed land won’t be so kind to a newcomer. The bitter feuds between the settler factions may prove deadlier than the malevolent coast itself. The young captain must navigate a treacherous balance of interests to come out of this mess on top.

name: The Veil of the Forgotten
description: Sin descripción

name: The Trials of Ozymandias
description: Sin descripción

name: Chrysalis
description: Experience fast-paced, sci-fi action in a top-down shooter where an outbreak of paranormal creatures turns a high-tech laboratory into a battleground. Fight your way through intense encounters using advanced weaponry and strategic movement. Powered by a custom game engine, this adventure combines chaotic combat with stunning visuals for an immersive experience.

name: Departed
description: Departed is an anomaly detection game, where you are stuck inside a looping subway system. Explore the station carefully and spot the differences. Nine consecutive correct decisions will bring you closer to your goal. Can you make your way through the endless platforms or will you get lost forever?

name: Gems Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Friends Adventure
description: This is a platformer game with multiple controllable characters that can be played by one or more players in split screen mode and you will need these characters to solve many puzzles and defeat some enemies in this game to progress through the levels and move around the map.

name: Touhou Saibanmu: Rookie Attorney Legendry
description: A puzzle-solving detective game based on the Touhou series. It mainly tells the story of Marisa Kirisame who, by chance, becomes a lawyer. The story is divided into three chapters, each with multiple endings.

name: Helen in Hell
description: Helen in Hell is a bullet hell game where you fight & dash-dodge your way through dungeon waves of themed enemies. Unlock new weapons, abilities & power levels to help you defeat four challenging & unique bosses at the end of each dungeon.

name: Atari 50: The First Console War
description: Well before the current day console wars dominated social media and message boards, Atari's VCS and Intellivision collided in the first major video game rivalry in 1979. The battle only intensified when Intellivision started making games for the VCS, its fiercest rival's machine! In a series of exclusive interviews, the game makers who lived through the first console war explain how and why this unique chapter of video-game history unfolded.

name: Find All 5: Vikings
description: Hey you, warrior! Do you want to go to MeowHalla? Then grab your axe and sail with us to new lands full of glorious battles and rich booty.

name: War Job
description: If there was the war between professions, which side would win? Chef, Cameraman, Police, Singer, Farmer or other professions…?Use silly weapons like a pan or a spade, balloon ,pencil, needle, chicken, buffalo... 20 different job Will create a chaotic surreal physics effects on funny match 5vs5.

name: Vending Machine Business Simulator
description: Build your business! control every aspect of a thriving vending machine business. Buy, place, and restock machines to increase profits. Do you have what it takes to manage, expand, and dominate the vending industry?

name: Sex Machina
description: The city was destroyed and deserted long ago. But the stalker and his sidekick, a super sexy female robot, were on the lookout for all sorts of dangers. The hot female wildling turned out to be more of an insane sexual adventure than danger, though. The two used her body to commit every sin known!

name: Forces of Ether
description: Blast your way through an Isometric Open World Galaxy. Fly seamlessly to space. Lead your chosen faction in ground and space battles. Stop the imminent Collapse of civilization... Or let it all fall into ruin.

name: Project Starcrash
description: Use your powerful punches to defeat alien invaders in this 2.5D platformer.

name: Salvation: Immortale
description: The fog city detective with exceptional intelligence and keen insight, Mei Qu, one day encounters a snow country girl with snow-colored long hair and witch-like beauty, Snell, at a crime scene. From this moment, their fates begin to intertwine, and an adventurous story unfolds.

name: Mojito the Cat: Christmas Skins
description: Expand your cube-shaped friend collection with this 4 new Christmas based skins

name: Awaken: Hentai Dice
description: Awaken: Hentai Dice is an exciting adventure for adults. Magic exists among us, but is not available to everyone. Fulfill the prophecy using ancient dice, bring male magic back to our world and don't get caught by the Inquisition.

name: There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst
description: Play as the vengeful secret agent Virginia West and take on a silver-loving madman called The Silver Fox in this single-player interactive spy novel. Surveil your enemy, get revenge for your partner's demise, and maybe - just maybe - save the world along the way. Don’t do your best … Do your worst!

name: Customer Disservice
description: Customer Disservice is a fast-paced soul-crushing hostile work environment game designed to put your minimum wage skills to the test. Using the information provided in your handbook, determine what sales are allowed or disallowed by company policy and enforce appropriately.

name: Dark Skies 2: Keepers of Nemansk
description: A whole new Journey in Nemansk awaits you! 5 Years after the Nemansk Incident you enter the Area as a young Mercenary named Dima. Experience a whole new Story set in the fictional Nemansk Region and explore dangerous new environments!

name: Casino Simulator
description: Become the boss of the casino and lead your way to wealth and success with your strategic decisions. Casino Simulator offers an exciting experience full of realistic graphics, discover the intricacies of casino operation.

name: Cosmic Kitchen
description: Cosmic Kitchen is a 2D cooking game set in space! Your mission: Feed hungry monsters or else they will take over all the galaxies! Think fast and grab food as it flies into orbit. Use planets, asteroids and more to get cooking and save the universe!

name: Mask Around
description: Mask Around is an action-packed, weird and colorful 2D roguelite with tons of hidden secrets. Buy weapons & items, unlock masks with unique powers and combo enemies using melee attacks and shooting power.

name: Valefor
description: A Tactical Auto-Battler set in a Dark Fantasy world- complete with Roguelike Dungeons, a PVP Arena, Crafting and Kingdom Building.

name: NineHells
description: Ninehells is a psychological horror first person single player. with an unraveling mystery, enriched with voice acting, and has virtual haunted attraction feeling. You play as davie a man trying to remember his past while traveling though Hell. Play and find out what in the ninehells is going on!

name: Brew Besties
description: Brew Besties is a couch co-op top-down game where 2-4 players have to brew potions and deliver them to impatient customers. Every world comes with unique obstacles that will challenge your teamwork.

name: Quirkbound
description: Quirkbound is an absurd, colorful and lighthearted turn-based fantasy JRPG. Join Isaac, Clara, and Naoto as they fight bizarre enemies, collect stickers, and cook falafel for the sake of saving the world.

name: Proximate
description:
PROXIMATE is a dread-driven narrative game where you investigate a deep sea laboratory and piece together the events that lead to the research team’s demise.

You'll be required to wear an image recognition visor that only tells you the bare minimum information you need to succeed — and sometimes less. Use text information, proximity data and audio clues to form a mental map of your surroundings and pray that your technology won't fail you when you need it most.

name: Sexy Iron Maidens
description: Sexy Iron Maidens is an action-packed dieselpunk shmup. Not only you can charge tons of enemies here, but also discharge into bunch of beautiful ladies. Your crew awaits your orders and ready to catch a grenade for you with their bare chests!

name: Warbringers of Angrul
description: Warbringers of Angrul is a grand strategy RTS where you manage your empire on a grand campaign map and command your armies in exciting real time battles. Lead zealous crusaders, cunning elves, or savage orcs in bringing war to the world of Angrul in both single and multiplayer.

name: An Aisling
description: An Aisling is an adventure game focused on exploration, story, and character. Make friends or enemies as you try to uncover why people are dissappearing on the island of Rashinmore.

name: The Reluctant Redemption of Verity Lux
description: Unravel the mystery behind the disappearance of Druhyus' favorite celebrity playboy, Walker Kahmenos. Join investigative journalist Verity Lux, follow leads in the town's seedy underbelly, conduct interviews, and submit your findings as custom articles to seek out the truth before it's too late.

name: Graveyard Gunslingers
description: Shoot down furious hordes of zombies until morning arrives. During the day explore, gather resources, and upgrade your gear to prepare for the next night. Create a unique build combining your favorite gunslinger characters, weapons, and abilities. Survive!

name: House Hopper
description:
House Hopper is a challenging, stylised 3D, precision platformer where you jump through house-themed levels in a minigolf-ish fashion to collect keys to all the rooms, find all playable everyday-use objects and beat your high scores while avoiding falling, crashing and getting burned the best you can at the same time.
Jump. Fall. Crash. Repeat!

name: Random Thing Game
description: This stress inducing golf-like 3D platformer will push your resolve to the limit. Climb through super-hard levels, solve puzzles, unlock hidden playable objects! Beat your highscores! Is the game too hard? Get better!

name: Calcium Chaos: Derailed
description: Go on a journey by train to stop the evil necromancer and his skeleton army. Explore, upgrade your train and fight the skeletons with your abnormal weapons in this comical Twin-Stick Adventure game.

name: Stardust Exile
description: Stardust Exile is an RTS set in the Milky Way galaxy, containing currently known stars and exoplanets with their real characteristics. The remaining star systems are procedurally generated. It has both online mode and single-player skirmish mode. The online server is persistent and single-shard.

name: Two Falls: Nishu Takuashina
description: Immerse yourself in the harsh wilderness of 17th century Canada through the eyes of Maikan, a young Innu, and Jeanne, a French woman who crossed the Atlantic to start a new life. Decide how the characters will survive, and watch the impact of your choices unfold in this coming-of-age story!

name: Slitterhead
description:
Set in the densely cluttered streets of "Kowlong," filled with obscurity and chaos, this battle action-adventure game casts players as the "Hyoki," an entity devoid of memory and physical form. His only motive is to eradicate the monstrous beings known as "Slitterheads" crawling around the city, disguising themselves as humans.

Roaming the vibrant neon-lit cityscape, players must seek out allies among humans known as "Rarities," infiltrate and track dangerous organizations, and engage in battles harnessing the power of blood. As the suspenseful drama unfolds, delve into the mystery behind Hyoki's existence and the appearance of the Slitterheads.

name: Temporal Purge: Z
description: Become an interdimensional zombie slayer in Temporal Purge: Z, an action-packed zombie-survival FPS. Face the zombie onslaught as you eradicate countless undead monsters on your quest to save the future.

name: Zephon
description: Zephon is a post-apocalyptic 4X strategy game built on Proxy’s unique tactical combat system. Guide survivors through a grimdark future, navigating unexpected disasters, eldritch horror and cyberpunk monstrosities. What will you do to survive?

name: Super Seals Float
description: A puzzle game where you: slide, hop, ride, plop, pounce and bounce to get to the bubbles. Make the correct moves or sink into the sea of loneliness.

name: Ecosystem
description: Grow and modify an ecosystem, with simulated evolution by natural selection creating the lifeforms that inhabit it. All the creatures in the trailer evolved on their own in the game. None were hand-edited!

name: StarLightRiders: HyperJump
description: StarLightRiders: HyperJump is a fast paced and frantic multiplayer arcade shoot em up. Protect the solar system from the alien invasion and stop them from eliminating all life on Earth! Take control of the powerful HyperJump ships and blast the hell out of everything that moves.

name: Project Scrapper
description: Project Scrapper is a casual 2D objective shooter with one caveat: players have no guns. Armed with just gravitational rivets and an anti-gravity jump, players will need to come up with their own strategies on the fly to succeed.

name: Avenir Tower
description: Avenir Tower is a platforming game where you attempt to reach the top of a giant structure known as the Avenir Tower.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - The Setlist Edition
description:
Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival is a drum-based rhythm game featuring songs from genres such as Anime and VOCALOID, and also a variety of game modes!
Have fun playing solo or online!

description: Sin descripción

name: Home_0

Home_0 is a phycological horror where you play as 9-year-old boy relieving his memories on the most horrifying week.

Help yourself to get rid of the anomalies in your memories by choosing the right choice.

name: Dragon Ball Super Divers
description: Dragon Ball Super Divers is a Japanese arcade game developed by Dimps as the seventh Dragon Ball Z: Data Carddass game.

description: Start your railroad journey with Norfolk Southern here. This package delivers all you need to start your railroad business and contains four different locomotives with stunning details.

description: Sin descripción
