description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Eggconsole Xak II PC-8801mkIISR
description: This game not only enhances the visual beauty but also improves the action elements. Embark on an adventure in the world of Xak as the brave warrior Latok!

name: Games Advent Calendar 2024 Bundle
description: More fun during the holiday season with two Advent Calendars full of games!

name: Love Anime Boys Club: Language and Date Zodiac Signs
description: Discover this adventure through the city, where your mission is to win over the 12 most irresistible guys, each with a unique personality guided by their zodiac sign.

name: Nurse Call: Koi no Nurse Call
description:
Everyone wants to experience it at least once!
Being showered with attentive care and love surrounded by beautiful nurses!

name: Party Party Time 3
description:
It's time for a new and improved party time!
Compete or cooperate—there's no limit on the fun when everyone's together!

name: Odd Remedy
description: Escape the open-world island infested with monster spiders while on duty as a prisoner with your friends. Loot the city, destroy the caves, take some selfies on the way out in your car before you set sail.

name: Me and Gamer Girl
description: Sin descripción

name: Crimson Asylum
description: As a paranormal investigator fueled by curiosity and a thirst for the unknown, you've been dared to enter the abandoned halls of Crimson Asylum.

name: Symmetrical Logic Puzzles 1000
description: A luxurious puzzle game where you separate scattered gems into different rooms. However, the rooms must be point-symmetric with the gems at the center.

name: Battleminer Giants
description: Step into a breathtaking voxel open world from the creator of BattleminerZ, where towering giants, forged from the landscape itself, roam the land shaping the fate of kingdoms.

name: Spot The Difference: Christmas Edition
description: Celebrate the holiday season with Spot The Difference: Christmas Edition, brought to you by the original creators of the globally beloved Spot The Difference amusement machine game!

name: Arcade Archives: Vs. The Quest of Ki
description:
"VS. The Quest of Ki" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988.
The objective of the game is to recover the BLUE CRYSTAL ROD that has been stolen by DRUAGA.
The main character, KI, is controlled to reach the top of the tower where monsters are roaming around.

name: The Japanese Calligraphy
description: A Japanese Calligraphy Simulator Game! Not only can you practice writing with a brush following examples, but you can also practice writing hiragana and katakana! Self-scoring kanji tests! Grateful sutra copying! Let's study Japanese!

name: Coloring Game 5.1
description:
An additional set of images for Coloring Game 5.

Size: 25 images / 500,000 px.
Duration: 15 hours (Pen Mode) / 8 hours (Fill Mode)

name: Coloring Game 5
description: Coloring Game 5 - coloring by numbers. Is a bright representative of anti-stress games.

name: River City Saga: Three Kingdoms Next
description: In this second part of River City Saga: Three Kingdoms, our beloved hot-blooded high-schooler from River City, Kunio (Guan Yu) charges his way through to the apex chapter of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, the Battle of Wuzhang Plains. Experience a comedic twist on the classic tale, featuring a cast of over 100 characters!

name: Battle Spirits CrossOver
description: Battle Spirits CrossOver is a digital card video game developed and published by FuRyu.

name: Warriors United
description: Warriors United is a cooperative action game for up to 4 players. You'll fight and progress through levels filled with increasingly powerful enemies and bosses. Useyour skills and allies to become even stronger in your battles.

name: That Which Surrounds
description: Sin descripción

name: Tokyo Revengers: Last Mission
description: Action RPG based on the Tokyo Revengers series. Relive the main story events of Tokyo Revengers by leaping back-and-forth through time to get revenge against the worst possible future.

name: Gladiators Battle
description:
Step into Gladiators Battle, a captivating free-to-play online game that immerses you in the glory and grit of Ancient Rome’s famed arenas. Challenge yourself across 21 diverse mini-games, covering Combat, Puzzles, and Gambling. Each mini-game is crafted to test your strategy, skill, and luck, offering unique paths to honor and reward. From rigorous training to high-stakes tournaments and games of chance, each victory takes you one step closer to greatness!

Discover our extensive History section, filled with engaging insights into the life of gladiators, Roman warfare, and ancient traditions. With detailed lore spread across multiple pages, and a comprehensive glossary to deepen your understanding, you’ll be part of a living history as you explore and compete.

Earn Gold through each mini-game, then head to the Marketplace to strengthen your gladiator with powerful gear and exclusive items. Buy, sell, and trade your way to the top—without spending a single dime! Gladiators Battle is completely free-to-play, with no microtransactions, ensuring a pure and competitive experience. Use your gold wisely to boost your strength, challenge others, and rise to dominance, creating your own legend.

Join Guilds, forge alliances, and battle players and AI alike as you compete for glory. With unmatched strategic depth and an immersive historical experience, Gladiators Battle is not just a game—it’s an epic journey through ancient times where your legend awaits.

name: Waifu Impact 2
description:
Waifu Impact 2 is a third person shooter, adventure game with role-playing elements where you explore the Waifu Islands to unlock new characters and abilities.

Discover the secrets of the paradisiac Waifu Islands. Shoot and level up your characters in this sequel of the acclaimed Waifu Impact.

name: Drive Ahead! Carcade
description:
In Drive Ahead! Carcade, you win by knocking your opponents on the head in cars with just one hit, it’s that simple!

Experience a brand new evolution of the Drive Ahead! world, filled with real time multiplayer chaos and crazy unforgettable moments where anything can happen.

name: Wheel of Fortune Daily
description: Sin descripción

name: Miyamoto
description:
Open the board game, place your pieces, and get ready!
A casual deck-building x Japanese-themed card game!

name: Magical Bakery: Deluxe Edition
description: Welcome to a magical, flour-filled world!

name: Skydivers Paradise
description:
Can you take a simple step at 3 kilometers above the ground? Just hold your breath and push yourself to the limit. Everyone feels the fear, but not everyone can ignore it.

Skydiving is teamwork. Take your place in the beautiful figures at the speed of free fall. You have to stay calm and control the situation to get as many points as possible. Everyone in the team is counting on you.

name: MWT: Tank Battles
description: Immerse yourself in intense tank battles featuring the most advanced war machines including air defense systems, multiple launch rocket systems, self-propelled artillery, various types of drones, fighters, helicopters & more. Experience the modern combined arms battles in the most spectacular way.

name: Try Dying
description: A PvP party game where your goal is to DIE FIRST! Choose your cutest water dragon and hang out with your friends in a noose, catch knives and hug dynamite. But don't forget to stop your buddies who try dying!

name: Proverbs
description: Proverbs is a picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring a single ENORMOUS puzzle, inspired by Bruegel the Elder's 1559 painting "Netherlandish Proverbs"

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number
description: Relax and create beautiful pixel art with color-by-number and cross-stitch fun!

name: Glingdom
description: In "Glingdom," you're a hero in a medieval world, battling enemies and bosses with a deck of cards. Beat enemy waves and bosses, buy cards to strengthen your deck, and unlock new cards. Each deck offers unique challenges.

name: Oshukuju
description: This is the story of curse and blessing hidden under a bloodline. Tamako wakes up to see an unfamiliar ceiling. She seeks an escape from the mansion, through traces of distorted feelings. “Novel-to-Experience” Adventure Horror.

name: Rally Racing Drift 2024
description: As you ready to dominate the competition and win more races?

name: Gold
description: This is an idle game! You can randomly drop a gold bag when you idle! Click on the gold bag to open it and you can get gold! The value of gold depends on its weight! The heavier it is, the rarer it is!

name: Goat Simulator: Remastered
description: Goat Simulator Remastered is the latest in goat simulation technology. Your favorite chaotic sandbox is back and more beautiful than ever, with updated graphics, every DLC, and more bugs that you can shake a goat at. WASD to rewrite history.

name: Man Made
description: Man Made is an massive open world simulator that will challenge your skills in all aspects. Build, hunt, fish, plant and do various jobs for the residents.It's up to you how you earn and spend your money.

name: Saku the Covert Agent
description: As an elite hacker, you have received an anonymous commission. You will collaborate with the special agent "Saku" from an unknown organization to complete a thrilling cross-border mission.

name: Lean Simulator: Desperation
description: A Meme Clicker game gone wrong. How long can you survive?

name: Brutus Maximus
description: Embark on a hellish road trip around the Roman Empire. From Teutoburg to Rome, slay anything standing in your way, survival roguelite-style. Unlock new heroes, weapons, and skills to create synergies. Wipe out entire Roman legions in this hack-and-slash, stab, and shoot survivors game.

name: Mario & Luigi: Brothership
description:
The brothers return for a brand new adventure on the high seas! Set sail with Mario and Luigi on Shipshape Island (part ship, part island) and journey through the vast world of Concordia. Launch out of Shipshape’s cannon to visit, explore, and quest your way through islands that range from tropical rainforests to bustling cities.

Meet new friends along the way, like Connie and Snoutlet (who's definitely not a pig), and encounter familiar faces from the Mushroom Kingdom like Peach and Bowser, who may help you on your journey!

You’ll have to rely on Mario and Luigi’s brotherly bond to succeed. Use Bros. Moves to get past obstacles while you explore, and powerful Bros. Attacks in a dynamic twist on turn-based combat. You’ll need every edge this 'brothership' will give you to save the day!

name: Wonder Ball
description: An action 3D platformer with fast-paced gameplay and low-poly style graphics, inspired by the greatest classics of the genre. Full of platforming levels, combat arenas, many collectibles and secrets. Explore five worlds of Cyberland and save them from the malicious Virus and its army of bots!

name: Exorcist Onmyoji
description: This is a light puzzle game where you play as Onmyoji characters "Yang" and "Yue" to exorcise spirits from a mansion. Enjoy immersive, eerie puzzles without any fear!

name: Hidden Wings and Paws
description: Cute little animals hid in different parts of the world. Can you find them all?

name: Maximum Football
description:
Lead your team to victory in the ultimate football simulation! Start your college career or play with the pros across varied and dynamic stadiums around the country. As head coach, make all the decisions, from drafting your roster to calling the plays. The Maximum Football universe has been completely overhauled to deliver players an ultrarealistic experience that is entirely free to play.

Fully customize your team, recruit your dream roster, and take it to the gridiron locally or online as you build your legacy. Tight, rewarding moves allow players to feel the true sensation of being on the field and smooth, responsive controls mean every play is performed as planned. Live service content ensures fresh chances to up your game as you rise through the ranks to take your place beside the legends.

name: CarGo!
description: CarGo! is a chaotic couch co-op for up to four players. Working as a team of couriers try to collect and deliver as many goods as possible while keeping an eye out for time, traffic and roadworks!

name: Fear Is In The Mind
description: Immerse yourself in Fear Is In The Mind, a psychological horror game where a therapy session twists your reality, revealing your deepest fears as you find a way to mend your fragile mind.

name: Journey to Earth
description: You are an experienced astronaut, stranded in space. Will you reach Earth, or will you get lost in space and die?

name: Aery: Peace of Mind 2
description: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Horny Villa
description: All roads lead to Horny Villa: a casual NSFW merger game featuring engaging mechanics, spicy erotic content and the hottest girls. Build the villa of your wettest dreams and cast sexy babes to join you for the ride. Grab your purple robe and pipe, and create the largest empire of debauchery!

name: Jurassic Tower Defense
description: Welcome to Jurassic Tower Defense! Command your defenses and fend off waves of dinosaurs in this thrilling tower defense game. Strategically build turrets and manage resources to protect your base. Are you ready to rewrite history and bring about the extinction of the dinosaurs?

name: Tunnel Assault
description: “Pilot your spaceship through unyielding tunnels, dodging obstacles, and unleashing dual lasers in this procedurally generated, fast-paced adventure. Upgrade your arsenal as you advance, race against time, and emerge as the ultimate tunnel ace!”

name: Dark Hunting Ground
description: "Dark Hunting Ground" is a minimalist style of pixel construction brush treasure game. As a new member of the Hunter Association, players will hunt monsters against the void, gain trophies and experience in battles, and challenge the source of void erosion with your unique construction ideas.

name: Clock Rogue
description: Clock Rogue is a rogue-like game that challenges you to count without the time displayed to activate the attack. Build your own time clock and protect the hedgehog from viruses attack!

name: Dawn of the Ashen Queen
description: Dawn of the Ashen Queen is a classic grid-based dungeon crawler. Set out with your party to reveal the legacy of a millennia old curse in a narrative-rich experience. Explore the colorful world of Eshavon, unearth its many secrets and fight dangerous foes sent out to stop you in your mission.

name: Agent Brain: Tricky Puzzles
description: Every level introduces a unique solution method, breaking the fourth wall between the game and the player in unprecedented ways. From using a pause button to halt threats to turning off the sound to put an enemy NPC to sleep, the game continually surprises and engages players.

name: Empire of the Ants: Limited Edition
description:
TAKE PART TO AN EPIC JOURNEY: Take the role of a brave ant, with a 3rd person view and explore the abilities that can help you in battle and exploration.

The Limited Edition includes:
- The Full Game
- Steelbook cover
- Exclusive Lithograph art prints
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital Artbook

name: Abyssal Blood
description: Abyssal Blood is an Action Rogue-like/Survivors-like where you can dual-wield many types of different weapons at the same time. Play as Lucy, the daughter of Lucifer, who must eliminate all outlaw souls and demons from hell.

name: The Journey of Piggy
description: The Journey of Piggy is a roguelike adventure game with fast-paced, shoot 'em up combat set in a beautifully hand-drawn world. Choose from a variety of weapons, cards and power-ups to create unique builds and survive until the end.

name: Rainbow fighter
description: This is a fast-paced flying shooting game.

name: Metro Awakening
description: Metro Awakening is a story-driven first person adventure built exclusively for VR that blends atmospheric exploration, stealth and combat in the most immersive Metro experience yet.

name: Metro Awakening VR
description:
Metro Awakening is a story-driven first person adventure built for VR that blends atmospheric exploration, stealth and combat in the most immersive Metro experience yet.

Don your gas mask, brave the crippling radiation and venture into the depths of the Metro where threats haunt your every…

name: Terralysia
description: In the vibrant realm of Terralysia lurk relentless enemies. Brace yourself for grueling missions, endless onslaughts, and formidable bosses in this third-person roguelike. Use the right strategy and spells to survive a bit longer, but be warned, as you grow in strength, so do your enemies.

name: Unrailed 2: Back on Track
description: Unrailed is back on track with more co-op railroad construction chaos! Choose your path in a new world packed with bold biomes and bosses. Permanently upgrade your character and engines, even create and share your own levels - just don‘t let your train derail!

name: Clamb
description: A punishing VR climbing game. Climb a surreal mountain with nothing but a hammer.

name: Tower Factory
description: Tower Factory is a tower defense and automation game with roguelite elements. Optimize resource production using conveyor systems while defending against monster waves. Can you find and destroy the enemy tower before it's too late?

name: Dear Flower
description: Dear Flower is a point and click adventure game. You can experience the story with hand-drawn animation and cutscenes.

name: BMX Bastards
description: Customize your BMX and dive into a giant open world wich include Bike Parks from all around the world waiting for you.Can't find your favorite spot? Create it by yourself in our park editor.Don't wait any longer and come to prove you're a true Rider!

name: Fruit Switch
description: Take part in an adventure where you shoot your sticky fruits through the air with a slingshot mechanism to rescue your kidnapped fruit friends. Discover the interesting and special abilities of all fruits while you fight the vegetables and complete their challenges

name: Fusillade
description: Use your infinite deck of cards in real time to push back the never ending waves of pirates. Fly through a Roguelike, Arcade, Space Shoot em' up, and Destroy the Cosmos with unparalleled firepower, ingenuity, and a little bit of luck!

name: Ammo and Oxygen
description: Adrenaline shooter-roguelike with survival elements and suspense atmosphere. Try to unravel the mysteries, exploring stations, dungeons, canyons, swamps and permafrost, fighting alien creatures.

name: Chicken Police: Into the Hive!
description: A wild tale of loss, friendship, conspiracy, and... chickens?! Two rooster detectives are about to venture into the insect underworld to uncover a worldwide conspiracy, while also battling their inherent demons in this animal noir adventure satire.

name: Galactic Defense: Automation
description: "Galactic Defense: Automation" is a real-time strategy game that emphasizes unit behavior automation. All units run their own cycles: production, development, death, and recycling. Players design construction plans to defend and destroy enemies.

name: Blackout Memphis
description: Blackout Memphis is a fast topdown shooter, characterized by bloody melees and action-packed gunfights. The demanding gameplay is backed by electronic music that adds a special atmosphere to the gritty and violent action.

name: Empire of the Ants
description: Embark on an epic journey into the infinitesimal in this photorealistic strategy game. Play as a fearless ant and guide your colony through the dangers of the forest.

name: Atomic Picnic
description:
Atomic Picnic is a Co-Op Shooter Roguelite based on the new Swarm Survivors genre! Get together with up to 4 friends to fight frenzied monsters and gain experience to upgrade your weapons in an anime-style post-apocalyptic world.

Fight your way together through The Zone, an everchanging labyrinth created after the "Harvest Festival" happened. Unlock an incredible variety of upgrades that can radically change the way you play every time.

name: Stagdraft
description: Top-down 2D Pixel PvP set on Medieval Fantasy World Deploy to battle in Teambased PvP attempting to Capture Flags, Defeating Players, Looting NPCs, Defeat Bosses Gather, Craft, Battle, Loot your way up to conquer the Kingdoms

name: KiNoKoe: Tree's Voice
description: You play as Hiro, a young Japanese man whose life is filled with a boring job. One evening, you see a strange light in the park’s trees near your home. You walk to the oldest tree and discover strange symbols on a piece of bark...

name: Death of the Reprobate
description: Explore a world built from the luscious landscapes, turbulent townscapes and preposterous portraits of real Renaissance paintings. Death of the Reprobate is a Rabelaisian point and click adventure from the creator of Four Last Things and The Procession to Calvary.

name: OPG: Clan Wars
description: Clan Wars is a severe first-person shooter with survival elements in the open world and in some limited locations, primarily oriented on online multiplayer game, and with the presence of a cars and trucks.

name: Grab n' Throw
description: Throw your friends! What would happen if we could throw entire stacks of people around? Ridiculous sports are what would happen. In Grab n' Throw, take on the role of an athlete with Totally Natural upper body strength and play the full-contact games of the near-future against human and AI players.

name: Bioframe: Outpost
description: Bioframe Outpost is a 2d sci-fi action adventure game, dedicated to exploration, experimentation, emergent gameplay, and narrative. Its unique approach to non-linear exploration and action gameplay offers a fresh take on Metroidvania gameplay.

name: Freenergy
description: Develop your robot, combine abilities. Fight in turn-based mode, effectively distributing energy. Overcome all difficulties and gain freedom.

name: Techtonica
description: Techtonica is a first-person factory building game set beneath the surface of an alien planet. Work alone or in co-op to build factories, gather resources, research new technologies, mold the destructible terrain, establish a base of operations, and uncover long-forgotten secrets.

name: Sengoku Dynasty
description: Build and manage villages in an open-world feudal Japan. Survive, explore, meet unique characters, and establish your legacy. Play solo or in co-op multiplayer.

name: Mortal Rite
description: Mortal Rite is a third-person, action RPG that aims to breathe new life into the rogue-lite and dungeon crawler genres. In Mortal Rite you must face the blood spirit's trials as you ascend the tower in order to gain our access into the guild. The game can be played in single player mode or up to 6 player co-op!

name: Underground Garage
description: Become a mechanic in the world of illegal street racing. Buy used cars, repair and sell for a profit. Work on 20+ types of car. Develop a workshop and attract even more customers. Promote your cars online and sell greater numbers. There are also lots of available parts to use.

name: Slappyball
description:
It's hands playing volleyball.

Compete online and show who has the better ball handling skills. Style on your opponents through skill and a superior fashion sense.

name: Planet Coaster 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Create a splash with Planet Coaster 2 - sequel to the world's best coaster park simulator!

name: Mordhau: Diamond Edition
description: Mordhau is a multiplayer medieval slasher. Create your mercenary and fight in brutal battles where you will experience fast paced combat, castle sieges, cavalry charges, and more. Mordhau Diamond Edition contains the Main game and 8 DLC packs

name: Factory Escape
description: Has work ever tried to kill you? Max is trapped in a deadly factory. Use your rolling skill, dodge traps, and find the key to escape!

name: F1st Strike
description: F1st Strike is a turn-based game that combines elements of fighting games combos.

name: ISS Simulator
description: The ultimate space simulator game, precisely modeling the space and space environment inside the International Space Station (ISS).

name: Redhawk Simulator
description: REDHAWK Simulator is a laid-back flying simulator arcade game where players soar through four unique environments, collecting fruits and plants along the way to fuel their expedition. Score points by collecting as many as you can!

name: Dumb Ways Free For All
description: A new dumb adventure awaits with Dumb Ways: Free For All! Available on the Quest 2, Quest 3 and 3s, play solo or bring up to FIVE other players along to experience the dumb mayhem together. Embark on a ‘mostly-safe’ vacation where each destination brings wild activities and unexpected surprises - all in the form of crazy, fun-filled minigames!

name: Battle Spirits: Character Play Sheet Set 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Spirits: Character Sleep Set 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Georgie-Yolkie
description: Georgie-Yolkie is an all-new purrfect open-world platformer and collectathon! With huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of silly characters!

name: I Think You Can
description: There is a piece of wisdom: if you want to go fast – go alone. If you want to go far – go together!

name: The Fine Art of Murder
description:
Unravel the mystery, where every choice shapes your fate.
A supernatural gamebook brought to life, with multiple endings to discover. Fully accessible – with or without the screen.

name: Going Down Turbo
description: Going Down Turbo was created for the 10th anniversary and is not intended to replace the original megawad. Every map has some tweaking, adjusting and in some cases completely overhauling the gameplay to improve the flow and generally make it faster and more fun. Difficulty has been rebalanced to make it more forgiving for new players, while old players can go a bit more rambo if they feel like it.

name: The Memory Thieves
description: Immerse yourself in a unique cooperative multiplayer game for 1 to 4 players. Explore the graveyard of Ravenwood, pass through mysterious portals, and steal as much treasure as possible while avoiding the dangers.

name: Rivalhearts
description: Join Noah in his first year of university as he decides to overcome his heartache, pursuing either a tomboy classmate, gorgeous doctor, or junior-year goth!

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.3 - Virtual Revenge
description:
Version 1.3 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Yanagi and Lighter
• New Game Mode: Simulated Battle Trial
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Keep Looking
description: This is a nerve-wracking horror game that puts you in a dark, claustrophobic cave with a relentless creature. Survive by flashing your dying flashlight at the right moments—too soon or too late, and it’s over. You must keep an eye on the creature, but beware: staring too long is just as deadly.

name: Pinevale Settlements
description: Build and manage your own thriving colony in this engaging simulator. Balance resource management, strategic planning, and crafting to grow your settlement from the ground up. Perfect your strategy and watch your colony flourish!

name: Absolute-Full-Life
description: Colourful survival horror first-person shooter with manual weapon reloading and a mystery environment. Discover every secrets in an open world full of diverse enemies and hidden locations.

name: Church Simulator
description: Manage your own church. Perform baptisms, hear confessions, collect donations, oversee weddings and funerals, sell souvenirs, and customize your church. Manage the church’s economy and work to expand your church.

name: Midnight Memories: Sonata of the Soul
description: A sci-fi fantasy 2D Platformer. Story rich.

name: Planet Coaster 2
description: Dive into the thrilling world of Planet Coaster 2! Construct the theme park of your dreams with an intuitive piece-by-piece building system, as you meticulously craft and customise every aspect of your park down to the smallest detail. From towering rollercoasters to spectacular twisting water slides, let your imagination reach new heights to delight and thrill your guests.

name: Magical Bakery
description: Experience a life full of magic, challenges, and the joy of creating sweets that will leave a spellbinding impression on your customers. Become the ultimate magical baker and prove yourself worthy to inherit the Magical Bakery!

name: Epic Pixel War
description: An action roguelike where you send armies of powerful units with different powers to fight against hordes of enemies, upgrading and finding new units as you go.

name: Light's End
description: Lights End is a fast-paced hardcore first-person game where speed and aim matter. Every minor mistake can be your end, but don't give up, every replay you can improve your score and get to the final end of the loop of randomly generated levels.

name: Case Records: Fear of Abduction
description: Psychological horror, which is part of the games CASE: Animatronics and CASE 2: Animatronics Survival.

name: Beauty and the Beast
description: Is a female character as the main body of self-moving magic shooting game. Monsters want to invade the girl's home, you need to use magic to repel them.

name: Brighter Shores
description: Brighter Shores is an all new adventure from award winning MMORPG designer Andrew Gower. It is an enchanting point-and-click style RPG with hundreds of hours of gameplay, set in a land of magic and mysteries, with a huge number of professions to try, and something new to find around every corner.

name: Magic Card: CZ12
description: This is a very casual strategy card game that is very easy and simple. The goal is to win more coins and become the richest man in the world. The original intention of the game is to activate the brain and turn the tide against the wind.

name: Kiken Drive: 2nd Lap
description: Accident and destruction and crash type public roads arcade racing game. Compete for time and damages.

name: Dark Conflict
description: Welcome to "Dark Conflict"! This is a game full of strategy and war elements, allowing you to play as a leader, constructing buildings, assembling armies, and developing resources to compete for the glory of victory.

name: Trash Goblin
description: A cosy and moreish fantasy shop sim where you uncover, clean, upcycle and sell a vast variety of trinkets - both invaluable and unlovable - to a diverse cast of fascinating customers across a colourful fantasy city. Think Potionomics meets PowerWash Simulator, with a unique protagonist!

name: Rogue Samurai
description: Rogue Samurai is a roguelike action game where you must battle against waves of enemies. Fight, die, upgrade your skills and fight again until you beat all your enemies.

name: Run From Mummies
description: Be the tourist you were born to be! Play solo or tour with your friends, but make sure to run from mummies!

name: Monarchy
description: A 2D strategy game about a young heir who must defend the crown from those who want to take it.

name: Redline Crooks
description: Redline Crooks is a fast-paced roguelite vehicle combat game in which you destroy cops, walls and possibly yourself in a chaotic pursuit of freedom and riches. Upgrade, Slam, Taunt and Boost your way out of imprisonment through the lawless roads that lie ahead, and you may find personal absolution.

name: ShapeHero Factory
description: ShapeHero Factory is a game that fuses the factory simulation, roguelite, and tower defense genres. Use different shape combinations to mass-produce a variety of heroes, who will then fight all on their own. All you need to worry about is building the optimal factory to manufacture them.

name: Mirthwood
description: Embark on an enchanting journey and brave ferocious creatures in an immersive medieval fantasy world. Will you settle a new homestead to live a life of farming and trade, or pick up the sword and take up the adventurers' path?

name: Terror of the Seven Seas
description: Live a life as a mighty captain in a vast Seven Seas spanning Open World. Gather your crew, ready your ship and enter a world of swashbuckling and piracy. Whether to conquer the world for your king and glory, amass wealth beyond measure as a trader or become the very Terror of the Seven Seas itself!

name: Small People Defense
description: An indie 3rd person tower defense game where you queue up your own difficulty. Explore the depth of this real-time strategy TD game or simply enjoy leveling up your small person into the largest in the world!

name: Angel Wings: Endless Night
description: Trapped in a haunted mansion with only your wits and an unlikely ally at your side, what will it take to survive this endless nightmare?

name: Level Tank
description: Blast your way through swarms of enemies in this action-packed top-down shooter. Upgrade your tank, collect power ups, and survive against a wide variety of enemies while exploring diverse maps in multiple different game modes! How long will you last before getting overrun?

name: Tomorrow
description: Tomorrow has come! Get ready to fight in a post apocalyptic wasteland where survival is an ongoing adventure. In Tomorrow: MMO Nuclear Quest, players are thrown into a post nuclear wasteland full of zombie, monsters, and hostile factions. Set in the 2060s, the open-world RPG allows you to complete different types of quests. You can craft essential items, defend against zombie who have managed to survive the apocalypse, and much more. Each quest tests your skills and forces you to adapt in this harsh post nuclear MMO wasteland.

name: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
description: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown is a medieval survival city builder where the fate of your kingdom weighs heavily on the choices you make. Will you struggle to survive, or find the strength to Thrive?

name: Zombie Flick
description: It's a well-designed side-by-side action adventure game that allows you to control a single character, deftly destroying traps and heroically killing hordes of zombies along the way by executing gorgeous commotion, using a variety of weapons, and unleashing powerful skills.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: K-91 Version II
description:
Ready to command a "heavium" tank? The K-91 Version II gives you an impressive mix of solid turret armor, good mobility, and a reliable gun, allowing you to switch between offense and defense with a versatile play style.

Make the K-91 Version II yours with the Tank of the Month bundle! You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• K-91 Version II Soviet Tier VIII Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Neon Bundle
description: Humanity has been destroyed - and it's up to Gori, along with his deadly but wise-cracking sentient hoverboard, F.R.A.N.K, and morose A.I companion, CH1-P, to slay the evil Adorable Army with lethal combos.

name: Indie Platformer Bundle: Run & Jump Guy + Pancho's Mission
description: A pack of two classic-style indie platformers by Chepurniy Yevgeniy - Run & Jump Guy and Pancho's Mission.

name: Aaero + Aaero2 Bundle
description:
Experience both Aaero and Aaero2 in a double headline showcase you won't want to miss!

Aaero - Speed through stunning, stylised environments tracing ribbons of light, releasing the energy in the music. Battle strange enemies and fight epic boss battles all driven by an incredible licensed soundtrack.

Aaero2 - The critically acclaimed ribbon-riding rhythm-action rail-shooter returns! Fly solo or team up with a friend as you return to the world of Aaero. Take on giant creatures to massive tunes on a battlefield of beats.

name: Grapple Dogs Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Legends: From the Rift
description: Go original and experience the beginning of Apex Legends again. Relive the rush of that first drop in Launch Royale then get reacquainted with Lifeline, revived with new abilities to take the frontlines, glide to reposition, and more. Tear through the Outlands with Rift Relics, offering cosmic abilities and weapons that dial up your power. Wield the Raptor’s Claw, a new Universal Mythic Melee Cosmetic and harness the madness of science in the new Battle Pass Split 1.

name: Aeonic
description: In Aeonic you experience the greatest events in different parts of the planet in the most important epochs of civilization throughout the whole history from the beginning to the future in one playthrough.

name: Metro Awakening Deluxe Edition
description: 48 hour Early Access to the full game, and the Field Medic pack. The Deluxe Edition features the Memories of Polyanka pack—with a Nosalis Hide backpack skin, Nosalis Toy backpack charm, The Fallen backpack patch and Nosalis Skeletal glove skin—plus access to the digital VR Concept Art Gallery.

name: Magical Girls vs. Cat Aliens
description: Magical Girls vs Cat Aliens is a casual run and shoot game where you control a highschool girl fighting against the cat alien invasion. By charging her magical brooch she can transform into a powerful magical girl! Use your wand to shoot magical blasts on the enemies and dash to avoid being hit, because once attack can undo the transformation and you will have to survive on your own, without powers, until you can transform again! Can the magical girl bring the city's public safety to the maximum? Defeat alien cats and collect crystals to increase the public safety and the crystals can also be used to unlock new powerful wands!

name: Age of Wonders 4: Ways of War
description: Achieve perfection in battle with Age of Wonders 4: Ways of War. Embrace the Oathsworn culture and devote yourself to their warrior's code. Deploy disciplined monks and shadowy assassins. Investigate mysterious happenings that see your fellow Godir replaced by demons and dragons. Lead two new forms for your factions: the hulking Ogrekin or the strong Simians. This content pack contains a new culture, new tomes, new wildlife units and a new type of narrative event chain.

name: Papetura: Craft Edition
description:
One day Pape escapes from a flowery prison and finds little Tura, a magical being that he’ll take care of. Together they will have to face dark and flaming monsters which will try to burn down their beloved paper world.

Papetura is a handcrafted puzzle adventure game made entirely out of paper.

Along with atmospheric music made by Floex, Tomas Dvorak, it creates a mysterious and unique paper world shrouded in shadow and light.

Everything is made out of paper, from tiny insects, strange creatures and monsters to truly magical locations.

Includes Exclusive Case, Downloadable Soundtrack, Art book and Base Game.

name: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly - Definitive Edition
description: This mod fixes hundreds upon hundreds of bugs, restores many pieces of unused and even cut content, and adds key quality-of-life improvements to make the experience better than ever.

name: Deities Flush
description: This is a card-building game, where users build decks to pass levels.

name: 63 Days: The Home Army Edition
description:
A real-time tactics game that takes place during 63 days of the Warsaw Uprising in 1944.
Sneak, plan and fight your way through the captivating main story of brotherhood and bravery against overwhelming odds, solo or in co-op.

The game has been developed by Destructive Creations, a veteran company based in Poland that has been responsible for other successful titles such as Shame Legacy, Hatred, Daymare: 1998 or War Mongrels. The latter was the base game for the development of 63 Days.

Immerse yourself in a fast-paced action and strategy game set in World War II where your tactics and stealth will make the difference.

name: Clicker Clicker Clicker
description: Click on the cursor to receive clicker gold. Upgrade your clicks with your clicker gold. Click on the falling cursors to receive more clicker gold! Purchase projectiles in the shop that will clean out the falling cursors for you.

name: Aldoria
description: Explore your way through the dangerous fantasy land of Aldoria where a single hit will kill you! Slay monsters and collect magical abilities in this small skill-testing metroidvania.

name: Hearthstone: The Great Dark Beyond
description: Long ago, the distant planet Argus was attacked by the demonic Burning Legion. While most of Argus gave in to unholy promises of power, some brave souls escaped to the stars. These “exiled ones” now call themselves Draenei, and they need you to help them find a new home. Pilot your own Starship and explore the vastness between worlds in The Great Dark Beyond!

name: Green Heights
description: In this vertical precision platformer, run, jump, and climb your way through challenging obstacles with satisfying and tight controls. Navigate through atmospheric terrarium vegetation and uncover hidden paths. Perfect for fans of skill-based platformers—every fall is your fault!

name: Kusodeka Bayashi
description: Kusodeka Bayashi is a first-person horror comedy game. It has one ending, and the time to complete this game is about 2 hours.

name: Leapo Faith
description: Play as LEAPO FAITH, and climb the tower by running, jumping, sliding, and swinging to find out what lies above.

name: You Have My Support
description: Brought to you by the Lost Ether Crew, You Have My Support is a small collection of 3 unique maps based around slight texture limitations except for anything with a "SUP" prefix. ﻿

name: Aquatic Store Simulator
description: Dive into the vibrant world of aquatic retail with Aquatic Store Simulator! Take on the challenge of managing your very own underwater-themed supermarket, blending business management with the beauty of aquatic life. Stock shelves with exotic fish, decorations, set prices, take payments and maintain aquariums.
Idle clicker game with a percentage based math inside. Compound percent is used for all calculations. Slow start, exponential growth and lots of fun!

name: DuckLaserDuck
description: DLD offers synergies unfettered by balance. Chain lightning proc'ing explosions for exponential chaos. Your brain won't be able to handle the copious amount of Juice. If things get too crazy, it's your fault! :D

name: Death Note: Killer Within
description: Death Note: Killer Within is an online social deduction game for up to 10 players. Players will be split into two teams with different objectives. To win the game, players will need to figure out each other’s identities and either eliminate L who threatens Kira's power or seize the Death Note.

name: Soccer in a Box
description: "Soccer in a Box" is a soccer game that supports 2-8 players competing on the same stage. Use various dances to kick all the balls into the opponent's goal!

name: 101 Cute Playland Dogs: Find & Paint
description: Find the cutest dogs hidden in a beautiful hand-drawn illustration and express your creativity by bringing them to life with color! Enjoy a relaxing mix of hidden object and coloring.

name: Alien Ship Console
description: Alien Ship Console is an atmospheric puzzle game with arcade elements, where you must navigate mysterious interfaces aboard an alien spacecraft. Explore the buttons and levers, solving unique challenges posed by an unknown alien civilization.

name: Incremental Dice
description: Chill incremental game about dice making money. Upgrade your dice to make more money, to upgrade your dice to make even more money!

name: Asunder II
description: More than a decade in the making this groundbreaking humorous fantasy ARPG is actually fun to play. But be forewarned it's a difficult game.

name: Tiny House Simulator
description: Manage your own tiny house building company in this open-world adventure. Create unique homes for clients, discover varied landscapes, and deliver your creations across the island. Upgrade your business, navigate picturesque routes, and immerse yourself in beautiful scenery.

name: Ruins of Dawnseeker
description: Awaken to a world shrouded in mystery in this captivating JRPG dungeon crawler. Follow the intertwined fates of Feriza, Layla, and Yosephine as they navigate treacherous dungeons and face formidable foes, all while piecing together the fragments of their lost memories.

name: Riot Ride
description: Riot Ride is a car-combat roguelike where you play as a car in retro and Tron-like vibes. Speed, drift, and pull off the craziest maneuvers while crushing challenging enemies and bosses with endless synergies of weapons and items.

name: Let's Sing 2025 with International Hits
description:
Let's Sing 2025 brings the ultimate karaoke experience straight to your living room! Sing along with your family and friends to the latest hits, as well as a generous selection of all-time classics.
Complete your journey to stardom with a brand-new career mode, or join the VIP ranks to gain access to even more tracks. Perform at home or online with a global cast of singers!

name: Let's Sing 2025 with International Hits: Gold Edition
description:
Let's Sing 2025 brings the ultimate karaoke experience straight to your living room! Sing along with your family and friends to the latest hits, as well as a generous selection of all-time classics.
Gold Edition: The Let's Sing 2025 Gold edition includes 35 songs, as well as a one month free trial + 3 months of VIP Pass.

name: Let's Sing 2025 with International Hits: Platinum Edition
description:
Let's Sing 2025 brings the ultimate karaoke experience straight to your living room! Sing along with your family and friends to the latest hits, as well as a generous selection of all-time classics.
Platinum Edition: The Let's Sing 2025 Platinum edition includes 35 songs, as well as a one month free trial + 12 months of VIP Pass.

name: Let's Sing 2025
description: The thirteenth main installment of the popular music game series, allowing to test our vocals. In Let's Sing 2025 we can sing songs from Ariana Grande, Billie Ellish, Ed Sheeran and other popular artists. There's a career mode and we can also play various multiplayer modes.

name: Impetum
description: IMPETUM - horror, thriller, drama with elements of detective fiction. Can you uncover the truth without losing your mind?

name: 101 Cute Dogs: Find & Paint
description: Find adorable dogs hidden in a beautifull hand drawn illustrationand unleash your creativity by painting them! Relax and enjoy this delightful blend of hidden object and painting gameplay.

name: Aquatic Supermarket Simulator
description: Dive into the vibrant world of aquatic retail with Aquatic Store Simulator! Take on the challenge of managing your underwater-themed supermarket, blending business management with the beauty of marine life. Stock shelves with exotic fish, decorations, set prices, take payments and maintain aquariums.

name: Manda: Mario and Ana
description: This is my first game. This is a game that can be played by yourself or in pairs. You can control Mario to jump, run, and control Ana to shoot, heal Mario, or clear obstacles. Survive as much as possible in a random world to get higher scores.

name: Lucky Hunter
description: Lucky Hunter is a deck-building auto battler Roguelike game. Your pieces are automatically played on the board, and players will focus on building unique decks and relics, making the best of the synergies between pieces to defeat increasingly powerful prey.

name: Echoes Afterfall
description: Team up in a chilling co-op experience, delving into mysterious realms to unearth relics amidst lurking horrors. Survive together or succumb to the abyss.

name: Heroic Assault
description: Heroic Assault is a reverse tower defense game where you prepare your army to go through the infested lands of defenses. Choose wisely your units depending on the layout of the defenses and equip them with unique abilities.

name: Dustland Delivery
description: Dustland Delivery is a post-apocalyptic survival business simulator. Scour the wastes for profit, complete missions to grow your trading empire, and assemble a rag-tag band of adventurers to turn your city into the capital of the Dustlands. Danger lurks around every corner—but no risk, no reward!

name: Robot Trivia Funtime
description: Robot Trivia Funtime is a multiplayer trivia game for PC, with a built-in question pack editor and Workshop support. It supports up to 6 other players on Steam and includes optional AI bots to play against.

name: Wrong Number
description: A short yaoi visual novel set in Australia. Go on a date with a stranger, become friends, or maybe something more... or nothing at all.

name: Lilith Rising: Season 2
description: Lilith Rising - Season 2 is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. Return as the prince that was exiled from by a demon warshiping cult, with your companions journay to become stronger to save your kingdom. Your adventure will be filled with epic fights, romance, mystery, humor, drama and lots of sex.

name: PrisonSoul: Reunion
description: An ancient castle with human-making technology.A human, a dummy...Unrelated brothers, imprisoned by time in a castle...When you unlock the secrets of time, can you escape from your predicament?

name: Boring Movies
description: Challenge your friends to identify famous movies based on your most boring possible description of the plot! Can you stump them or are your friends actual true cinema fanatics that can name Citizen Kane from the most minute detail?

name: Spring Dogs: Ultimate Multiplayer Battle Royale
description: Step into the frenetic universe of Spring Dogs and strive to emerge victorious in this locally focused multiplayer battle royale. Customize your character and challenge up to 17 AI-controlled competitors, 8 human players in split-screen, or 16 in team mode.

name: Bunker Invaders
description: Work with your crew to keep the bunker standing.

name: Walrus Run
description: Walrus Run is a 2D Action Platformer, compatible with conveniently-shaped bongo controllers. Slide, dash and eat through obstacles to get a high score and take back your fish from the greedy Sargent Seal!

name: Absolute Insanity
description: Armed with a diverse arsenal of weapons battle through ever-changing mazes and confront eerie, evolving enemies in a pulse-pounding survival horror action-packed experience.

name: Save the throne
description: In save the throne you will build up your defenses and shoot skeletons to save the throne against ever increasing waves of skeletons.

name: League of Masters
description:
League of Masters is a multiplayer Autochess strategy game.

The game takes you to the distant past, the times when magical creatures lived on Earth together with people: elves, orcs, dwarves, jinns, and many others.

Explore the world of the auto battler League of masters in the PvE campaign mode, join the crusade against chaos, and jump into battlegrounds with new allies in your battle squad! You have 12 commanders and over 50 fighters with unique abilities to strengthen your tactics in the strategy game, defeat your enemies, and save the world from Evil.

Prepare to dive into adventure, flashy battles, and spectacular clashes! There’s much more than just a PvE campaign: raid enemy castles, enjoy flying solo, or take up PvP team fights in the battle arena.

Plunge into the unique atmosphere of autochess, and savor its fascinating story and vibrant graphics. If nonstop adventures, legendary battles, and spectacular victories are your thing, this auto battler is just what the doctor ordered!

name: Relieve
description: "Relieve" is a hand-drawn comic style narrative puzzle visual novel with unique art and high-quality music. It allows you to experience the story of a couple's separation and reunion from different perspectives.

name: Skolly's Adventure
description: Explore a sky filled with floating islands as Skolly, an unusual adventurer in search of all the hidden treasures of this forgotten world.

name: IfSunSets
description: IfSunSets is a Survival Game with Adventure & RPG elements. By day, you have to gather supplies for your survival on this island. As night falls, you will encounter strong and dreadful enemies that will relentlessly hunt you down.

name: Animalism
description: It's time to become an actor in social deduction games! Become animals assigned roles and cooperate or compete for collective or individual goals. But watch out for the animals next to you, each with a different purpose. They can be allies, bystanders and even traitors!

name: Warlords Battle Simulator
description: Test yourself as a commander in a tactical game where you will have to choose the right units to defeat the enemy forces. Test combinations of different units in over 100 fun levels as you fight disciplined Undead, fast Barbarians and strong Orcs.

name: Afterlife Gladiator
description: Warriors, mysterious creatures and even prehistoric animals have all become trapped in a realm beyond death where once a year they must fight each other in a team tournament for the ultimate prize: Freedom.

name: Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch
description: From the world of "Lost Eidolons" comes an all-new turn-based strategy RPG. Stranded on a mysterious island with scattered memories, your only means of survival is to fight. Recruit allies, undertake a perilous journey, and battle to reclaim what you've lost... no matter how many deaths it takes.

name: Elemental Realms
description: Element Realm is a puzzle game with a magical adventure theme. The game tells the story of a wizard's adventure to the elemental world in order to protect the world. You play as a wizard, visit different worlds, use different magic to solve massive levels.

name: Surviving the Abyss
description: Discover and mine resources for construction, light your way in the dark, explore and expand into your surroundings to advance your research. Capture the diverse, highly-adapted flora and fauna of the deep, but beware: the darkness hides unexpected horrors, with only the light keeping them at bay.

name: World War 3: Card Battler
description: Play as your favorite country, in a card battle for world domination.

name: Last Vanguard
description: Explore an open world with metroidvania mechanics, different biomes, secret items, guns, dungeons and bosses. Make Friends and meet gorgeous places.

name: The Matchless KungFu
description: The Matchless Kungfu is an open world sandbox RPG game based on a WuXia background. You can play any martial arts role you imagine in this wild world. Travel through the great wilderness, or be the leader of the group. The most important thing is, build your own story and live the experience!

name: Metal Slug Tactics
description: METAL SLUG makes an explosive return! Dive into this dynamic tactical RPG with a roguelite thrill and experience the iconic run'n'gun action of the original series, redefined. Grab your weapons, assemble your squad and conquer the battlefield to defeat the infamous Rebel Army.

name: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles - Mongres Trader Bundle
description:
Bulwark is about designing your fortress and expanding it into an empire.

I hope you enjoy my attempts to experiment and evolve this game into something enjoyable and fresh.

name: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles - Mad Lector Bundle
description:
Bulwark is about designing your fortress and expanding it into an empire.

I hope you enjoy my attempts to experiment and evolve this game into something enjoyable and fresh.
Bulwark also continues to evolve with each passing update, based on your feedback.

name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Dragon Bundle
description: Humanity has been destroyed - and it's up to Gori, along with his deadly but wise-cracking sentient hoverboard, F.R.A.N.K, and morose A.I companion, CH1-P, to slay the evil Adorable Army with lethal combos.

name: Laser Panic
description: Play as a four legged robot. Try to collect as many gold diamonds as possible. Dodge lasers and escape through the sliding doors to the next level.

name: Project Neon
description: Project Neon is a new, vertical / TATE style Shoot 'Em Up (shmup), developed for the original Neo Geo MVS / AES platform. It features a 1-2 player mode, with all the bells and whistles of a classic shoot 'em up that you would expect, spiced up with some modern and unique concepts and game mechanics.

name: Condor 3
description: Condor Soaring Simulator simulates the complete gliding experience on your computer. With it you can learn to fly gliders and progress up to a high level of competition skill. The core of the simulator is the state of the art physics model and advanced weather model aimed at soaring flight.

name: Maniac Path 3
description: Go into the abyss of madness to go through the difficult path of a broken beast that spares no one

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Glimmer and the Dark Halloween Pumpkin
description: In the quiet town of Hollowhill, every Halloween, lanterns not only light up the streets, but also protect the town from the dark forces that lurk.

name: World War II City Rebirth Tycoon
description: Lead a war-torn city to prosperity in a post-WWII rebuilding adventure.

name: The Broken Vow
description: Unravel the mystery by finding notes, objects and memories hidden around the house. Find out what happened to Clark, escape Emma and escape — even if it takes strength.

name: Rev Grav
description: Sin descripción

name: Criss Cross Bomb
description: Sin descripción

name: Mind Loop
description: Enter the endless hall where reality distorts. Spot anomalies, correct them, and uncover the dark truth—miss one, and you may be lost forever.

name: Tales from Mars
description: Tales from Mars is a collection of 2 maps based on E1M1, a classic Knee Deep in the Dead ﻿ma﻿p and E1M2 with latter leaning more into﻿ The Shores of Hell. It's got all the monster types and a couple of traps that will hopefully stress you a bit.

name: Airborne Justice
description: Airborne Justice is a shoot 'em up that pays homage to classics from the golden age of video games. Take control of a helicopter, fight enemies, and restore peace to the skies!

name: Shadow's Descent
description: "Shadows' Descent" is a psychological horror game where you investigate a very special hospital, full of mysteries and dangers. Solve puzzles, discover terrifying secrets, and survive an oppressive atmosphere where every shadow can be a threat.

name: Escaping Diddler
description: Escaping Diddler is a stealth survival game where you escaped the Diddler party, while navigating Diddler's Backyard, Steal bottles of baby oil to escape, but beware—getting caught means game over. Stay hidden, outsmart the Diddler, and escape.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kuradashi-hen
description: “Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kuradashi-hen” is a collection of "what if?" stories derived from scrapped concepts in the writing and development of the original story, showing the way Ryukishi07 went on writing the stories and his thought development process for the Higurashi series. This is a fan visual novel adaptation of the original.

name: Dead Abyss
description: A short first-person horror experience that places you in the rusted out hull of a mysteriously abandoned shipwreck. Search for clues, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery of the wreckage, but beware of the evil that lurks within.

name: Maze Escape
description: A maze chase game. A monster is chasing the player, and the player needs to keep running, jump over the guardrail, avoid being caught by the monster, and gradually find the maze exit and escape the maze.

name: Metamathema
description: Engage proxy wars as an elite merc on Metamathema, the secret military service platform providing millions of stealth missions. Arm yourself fully to infiltrate the enemy FOB. Complete the mission and survive in a jungle surrounded by enemy troops. Search, eliminate, and gather intel.

name: Ball Game
description: Welcome to ball game! Roll, bounce, and spin your way through a series of ball based obstacles and levels. Be careful not to fall too many times or take too long, but most importantly, have fun!

name: Mytho Duel
description: It's an adaptation of the classic card game "Triple Triad" for an interactive in-menu experience. This game offers engaging and strategic gameplay, allowing players to challenge their own strategic planning skills.

name: Nightshade Mysteries: Eternal Moon
description: In 1930s Southern Europe, dauntless archaeologist Helena Nightshade gets entangled in the mysteries surrounding an ominous eternal lunar eclipse, prophesied by estranged Moon Worshippers also known as the Anaxagori.

name: Nazar
description:
Experience the world's first fusion of FMV genre and 2D platforming in this revolutionary sci-fi adventure. Explore Cappadocia's mystic realm where fortune-telling meets quantum physics. Join Nazar, unlock psychic powers, and race to prevent a dark future in this genre-defying journey!

Step into a world where ancient mysticism meets cutting-edge science in this groundbreaking FMV adventure from internationally acclaimed game designer Dr. Eray Dinç. Set in the mesmerizing landscapes of Cappadocia, Turkey's most enigmatic region, this game weaves a tapestry of Anatolian lore, arcane rituals, and futuristic technology.

Inspired by the time-honored art of Turkish shadow puppetry, this unique experience fuses 2D platforming with interactive cinema, all set to a haunting score by legendary composer Inon Zur. But what truly sets this game apart is its revolutionary mechanic: your ability to peer into the future.

name: Bonesaw
description: Bonesaw is a turn-based psychological horror game with highly strategic gameplay and a stress-inducing saw mechanic. Plan your moves carefully to outsmart the devil or challenge the odds and gamble the fate of your fingers.

name: Skill Legends Royale
description: This is a free multiplayer PvP strategy game that incorporates rogue-like and auto chess elements, players need to equip their auto-battling heroes with the right treasures and skills to ultimately defeat all other players and become the champion.

name: Agnition: Ignis
description: Conjure the fire to solve puzzles of the mountain that holds the salvation of your people in this top-down puzzle game.

name: Overseer: Field Trials
description: Step into the role of a paranormal agent. It's time for field trials where you’ll identify anomalies firsthand. The trials are partially staged, with your team ready to assist, but stay alert—unexpected threats may arise. Successfully report anomalies multiple times to earn your Field Agent badge.

name: Five Nights At Skibidi Toilets
description: FNAST offers a unique gameplay that combines elements of strategy, survival and horror. Will you be able to solve the mystery of this mysterious building and prove the truth of the information from the newspapers?

name: Ad Shoot
description: A 2D vertical scrolling bullet-hell shooter game where you shoot down fictional advertisements. Features 7 stages and full Japanese voice acting.

name: TRex Hero
description: TRex Hero is a hilarious action game where you must literally run from one side of the screen to the other to save your life, while rescuing future generations of dinosaurs from an asteroid rain. Avoid the funny effects caused by the asteroids, while taking advantage of powerful power-ups.

name: Munch
description: Kill. Eat. Evolve. Unleash your inner monster and incite Chaos in this reverse-horror fantasy action roguelite. Devour the Followers of Order to absorb their elements and mutate a new twisted body forged from Flesh, Nekro, and Ore. Crush their god Ördo to bring back the Gods of Heavy Metal!

name: Cube Hero Odyssey
description: Embark on a monster-slaying adventure as a caped hero wielding his anti-fragile blade! A hack-and-slash, isometric roguelite with beautiful procedurally generated worlds, challenging bosses, creative build choices and endless gameplay!

name: The Lost Penguin
description: The lost penguins need help to find their way home. You move the penguins on 2D tiles, strategically plan the route, connect with friends, interact with eggs, blockers, teleports, sharks, and solve unique problems on each level.

name: Truth Seekers
description: Truth Seekers is a horror multiplayer cooperative shooter game centered around hunting urban legends and folklore monsters. Find and craft items to aid in your attack, all while strategizing with others to learn the monsters' behaviors before they learn yours...

name: CatMelon: Suika Game
description: Combine several adorable cats dressed as fruits inside their favorite playing space: the cardboard box! Match two identical cats to create an increasingly larger cat until you reach the CatMelon. Develop your best strategy to remain at the top of the ranking!

name: One Socket
description: Charge the generator to power your devices, but be careful, you only have One Socket to work with. Make tough decisions to keep you safe from the monster in the dark while you solve the mysteries that will free you. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Frog Corner
description: Frog Corner is a single-player horror game where you go to an abandoned arcade looking for the arcade machine "Frog Corner", yet you go too deep inside the building. The deeper you go in the weirder and deadlier it gets.

name: Lucky Hunter
description: Lucky Hunter is a deck-building auto battler Roguelike game. Your pieces are automatically played on the board, and players will focus on building unique decks and relics, making the best of the synergies between pieces to defeat increasingly powerful prey.

name: Critical Fishing
description: Take part in wormkinds heroic struggle for freedom from their archnemesis. Upgrade your arsenal, tools and submarine to decimate the fish population to reach the ultimate goal: to boldly go where no worm has gone before.

name: Crossed Wires
description: Navigate your oblivious companion through a world filled with dangers such as lasers, rush hour traffic, homemade flamethrowers and aggressive cleaning robots by solving a variety of puzzles in this hilarious and unpredictable adventure. Can you keep him safe from himself?

name: Rebel Duet
description: Rebel Duet is a story-driven adult visual novel, where you are summoned to become the partner of a beautiful young succubus. Sexually train your demonic companion, and evolve from a humble office worker into a powerful spellsword. How much of your humanity are you willing to trade for power?

name: Gods Wars: Infinity Epic
description: Come and defeat the evil gods! Create your personal outfit, overcome the siege of numerous monsters and leaders, and usher in a new victory! Gods Wars is a pixel ARPG Rogue like Game. You can obtain epic artifacts, upgrade epic skills, choose your epic pet, face the powerful evil gods!

name: Horizon's Mirage
description: Horizon's Mirage is a exhilarating first-person parkour set in a futuristic cityscape surrounded by skyscrapers. Progress through checkpoints, conquer dynamic obstructions, explore alternative paths and gather collectables to unlock time reduction, dashing, teleporting and more.

name: Ruthless:1
description: Ruthless:1 combines ARPG Hack and Slash with creature collection and puts it into a war-torn sci-fi world. Destroy enemy Mechs, grow your army and build the ultimate roster. Countless skills and items allow you to play the style you like.

name: An Evening of Wonders
description: An Evening of Wonders is a choice-driven adult romance visual novel. Your childhood friend invites you to his birthday party where a beautiful stranger catches your eye. Your choices will determine whether you stay strangers forever or leave the party holding her hand after a wild night together.

name: Storybook of Tactics
description: Storybook of Tactics is a rogue-lite auto battler with deck building elements. Survive all the story chapters, upgrade unit cards, and experiment with dozens of builds while acquiring game-changing powers and powerful items.

name: Traxion
description: Traxion is a cave flyer featuring beautiful pixel art, great music, and sophisticated in-game physics.

name: Great Toy Showdown
description: Welcome to the Great Toy Showdown!! A casual shooter 8-player battle royale game where a variety of animal toy friends battle to be the only one left standing and win the love of their lives. Take on outcast and fallen toys and other animal toys to become the only surviving toy!

name: Better Me Tree
description: Better Me Tree is an interactive self help application that includes simple objectives that are spoken aloud by the user to promote daily positive reflection, motivation, encouragement and edification.

name: Super Cave Boy
description: Super Cave Boy is a challenging platforming puzzler where advance in a dungeon full of puzzles. The game structures the dungeon in rooms / stages where you only have a limited amount of actions to do in order to finish.

name: Tower of Darkness
description: TOD(Tower of Darkness) is dungeon exploration RPG. Choose one of the main exorcists and explore the tower to defeat the demons and obtain treasures. But be careful! The number of enemies and treasures in the tower is limited, so make good use of them.

name: Zero Orders Tactics
description: Terraforming + Into The Breach! An experimental puzzle strategy where you are not commanding your troops - now, you are shaping the battlefield itself! Nothing is random, everything is predictable, and the battlefield is changing. Every turn. By you.

name: Dead Oculus
description: Dead Oculus is a lethal fast-paced bullet-hell where you can brutalize your foes by wielding custom weapons with cataclysmic attachments

name: Ritual Night
description: Summon Cthulhu in this social deduction game with no early eliminations! Monsters work together to complete the ritual, while stealthy humans secretly sabotage and cause chaos.

name: Seven Cities
description: Seven Cities is an Action-RPG which takes place in an urban contemporary world. A near-future New York full of intrigue. You play as an Outsider along with a robotic companion. Both will evolve through many intensive fights to find the 7 CEROM's.

name: Hardcoded
description:
Harcoded is a lesbian cyberpunk erotic dating sim about trans girls, droids, and slime monsters.

Hardcoded is an open-world dating-sim, set in the lawless reaches of a cyberpunk dystopia, in which you take on the role of a thinking / learning droid who has recently escaped her owners and is on the run. Before you can fully settle into your new life, it becomes obvious that Pira City is a place of dark and dangerous secrets. Fortunately, you're able to befriend a cast of very horny characters who seek your aid in pursuing a shadowrun-style investigation. You can spend your down time trying to establish yourself, by earning money, decorating your apartment, buying clothes, collecting sci-fi dildos, or working on turning friendships into romances.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Gold Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Blue Night Laundromat
description: A short 2D exploration adventure in a retro style! Explore a laundromat in the middle of the night and try to clear it!

name: Jigsaw Chronicles: Haunting Tales
description: Piece together haunting tales from around the world.

name: Empire of the Ants: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Experience Empire of the Ants like never before with the Digital Deluxe Edition. This exclusive package offers players a deeper dive into the world of ants with a 3-day early access, a digital artbook, stunning HD wallpapers, and an immersive soundtrack.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Full Game
- 3-day Early Advanced Access
- Digital Artbook
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital Wallpapers

name: The Last Human In The Universe
description: You are the last human that exists, and you wake up trapped in a spaceship full of dangers lurking around you. You must perform maintenance on the ship to keep it functioning until you reach Earth. Once on Earth, will everything start again?

name: Zompizza
description: Manage a pizzeria in the zombie apocalypse world and deliver delicious pizzas to survivors!

name: Tower Of Lies
description: "Tower Of Lies": Horror platformer with gripping narrative, suspenseful atmosphere, and unique gameplay. Uncover chilling secrets, face nightmarish encounters, and shape your fate in a desolate, haunted world.

name: Project Otherside
description: Project Otherside is a horror exploration game. Where players will be transported to an otherworldly dimension where they must navigate through endless spaces while being pursued by nightmarish entities..

name: Escapeland
description: Welcome to the world after the global flood. Join Nikolaj, a man with no past, on his journey through the Valley of Life. Guided by fate, he finds himself caught in the struggle between diverse clans, all vying for power over the remnants of humanity. You have to choose a side in this struggle...

name: Alone A Long
description: In a world where you are alone, you repeat your daily routine in a nonchalant and somewhat joyful manner. A simulation game to maintain civilization where the objective is to maintain civilization until the day when you can no longer move.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 2: Karate Champ
description:
Revisit the origin of one of gaming's most popular genre's with DATA EAST'S KARATE CHAMP, the first one-on-one fighting video game.

Released in 1984, Karate Champ quickly became a worldwide arcade hit, gaining the attention of a growing video games industry with its innovative dual-joystick control scheme and unique emphasis placed on precision movements and timing.

This collection of classic 2D fighting games features the pioneering KARATE CHAMP arcade game, alongside it's action packed spiritual successors FIGHTER'S HISTORY and FIGHTER'S HISTORY DYNAMITE/KARNOV'S REVENGE. This Double Disc Polymega Collection release also includes a bonus disc version of Fighter's History Dynamite compatible with Polymega as well as the original Neo CD system.

name: Polymega Collection Vol.1: Asteroids
description:
Embark on an intergalactic journey with ASTEROIDS, the iconic arcade game that thrusts players into the heart of a chaotic asteroid field in a frantic fight to survive.

Immerse yourself with lifelike arcade cabinets, complete with multiple zoom and rotation modes that make you feel like you're really standing in front of the machine, as well as new Atari Lynx LCD and Quadrascan Virtual Display Modes, so you can play classic arcade and handheld games that look and feel just like the originals!

Included are foundational influences like LUNAR LANDER, as well as game play evolving entries SPACE DUEL, GRAVITAR, and more to savor your cosmic journey into space.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 6
description: It’s the Snoop D-O-Double G! With more than 35 million album sales worldwide, Snoop Dogg is one of the biggest rap and hip-hop icons in the world, and now he’s the Icon for Fortnite Festival Season 6.

name: Madness Arena
description: Enter the ultimate battleground, where chaos reigns and survival is everything. Every decision could be your last—will you rise to the challenge or descend into madness? Master powerful abilities, crush your

name: Ball Rush 2
description: Smash a path to the finish!

name: Jet Combat: Cats vs. Dogs Military Simulator
description: Choose your side and rule the skies!

name: Coffee Please
description: Become a cozy coffee shop owner. Manage inventory, set prices, take payments, pet the cat, expand, and decorate your venue to build the best coffee house. Enjoy the charm of a heartwarming cafe simulator!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 2 Remix
description: The Island you knew is back, remixed and reimagined, with weekly location and loot drops inspired by the best of early Chapter 2 OG gameplay and some of the greatest music icons in history. In this time rewind, Snoop D-O-double-G heads up the Agency, the rap god Eminem sets up shop in the Grotto, hip hop princess Ice Spice lays claim to Shark Island, and the remix hits the finale with a celebration and tribute to the legend and icon, Juice WRLD. Push play, turn up the volume, and open up the vault in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 2 Remix!

name: Delved
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal Ninja
description: Eternal Ninja is a 2D platformer with puzzles and traps. Players learn from each death to progress through ingeniously challenging levels. It's a fun yet tough game, designed to test your skills!

name: Skater Bunny Simulator
description: Unleash your skate skills and hop to new heights with Bunny Skater!
